title: Pinterest Manager
description:
HOW TO APPLY



If this opportunity feels like the perfect fit for you and you meet the job qualifications, we invite you to learn more about our HiEnd Accents team in the Philippines and submit your application here:







Please note: Only applications submitted via this link will be considered.



 Job Description



We’re hiring a Pinterest Manager to take full ownership of our Pinterest presence and turn it into a high-performing sales channel.



This role owns both organic Pinterest growth and Pinterest Ads performance, with a strong focus on turning Pinterest into a scalable paid acquisition channel.



This is not a generic social media role—we’re looking for someone who deeply understands how the Pinterest platform works, from its search algorithm and Smart Feed to pin formats, trends, and conversion paths. Your goal: drive meaningful traffic and sales from Pinterest through smart, strategic execution.



Mission Statement: Build and scale a Pinterest strategy that doesn’t just look good—but performs. You will grow impressions, increase outbound clicks, and **drive profitable revenue through both organic content and paid Pinterest campaigns.



Primary Responsibilities





Pinterest Organic Strategy & Execution



- Develop and execute a Pinterest-specific strategy rooted in platform best practices and SEO.

- Stay on top of Pinterest’s evolving algorithm, features (e.g., Idea Pins, video), and trends to keep us ahead of the curve.

- Use keyword research and SEO to craft high-converting titles, descriptions, and hashtags.

- Align Pinterest strategy with seasonal campaigns, product launches, and key retail 
nts.

- Build and maintain a structured Pinterest keyword library to support ongoing SEO efforts.

- Leverage Pinterest keyword insights to inform both organic content and paid targeting.



Pinterest Ads Strategy & Execution



- Plan, launch, and manage Pinterest ad campaigns to drive traffic, conversions, and revenue.

- Develop a full-funnel Pinterest strategy that integrates organic content and paid amplification.

- Own campaign structure across prospecting, retargeting, and catalog sales campaigns.

- Manage budgets, bids, and pacing to hit performance targets.

- Continuously test audiences, creatives, and campaign types to improve efficiency.

- Partner with the eCommerce and analytics teams to ensure proper tracking and attribution.

- Scale winning campaigns while maintaining target CPA/ROAS goals.



Content Creation & Scheduling



- Design and publish optimized pins (static, video, Idea Pins) that speak to our target customer and drive clicks.

- Build and maintain organized boards with strategic themes and branding.

- Manage publishing cadence based on performance data and best practices through Tailwind, Pinterest Scheduler, or similar tools.

- Ensure all pins are visually on-brand and aligned with HiEnd Accents’ positioning.



Performance Analytics & Optimization



- Track and report on KPIs weekly/monthly: outbound clicks, saves, conversions, CTR.

- Run A/B tests on creative, formats, and timing to improve pin performance.

- Continuously refine strategy based on what the algorithm favors and what drives the best ROI.

- Monitor and optimize for downstrea
trics such as assisted conversions and revenue contribution where available.

- Monitor competitor activity and emerging Pinterest trends within the home and interior space.



Cross-Functional Coordination



- Collaborate with our marketing, design, and eCommerce teams to align Pinterest with overall brand goals.

- Repurpose and adapt content for Pinterest from broader campaigns and launches.

- Identify and surface high-potential UGC or inspiration imagery for Pinterest use.



Requirements



- Have 2+ years of hands-on Pinterest Ads and organic Pinterest experience** for a brand or eCommerce business.

- Demonstrated experience managing Pinterest Ads Manager, including campaign structure, audience targeting, and bid optimization.

- Comfortable working with performance data, dashboards, and attribution reporting.

- Passion for interior design, home décor, or lifestyle brands preferred.

- Experience working with luxury, premium, or design-driven brands is a strong plus.

- Must be able to collaborate during overlapping US business hours as needed.

- Understand how Pinterest works as a visual search engine, not just a social platform.

- Have a strong portfolio or case studies that show you’ve driven real traffic and sales from Pinterest**.

- Are skilled with Pinterest SEO, keyword research, and algorithm-based strategies.

- Know your way around Tailwind, Canva, Photoshop, and Pinterest Analytics.

- Are detail-oriented, self-directed, and results-focused.

- Bonus: experience with affiliate marketing, *
 capture from Pinterest, or using Pinterest for DTC sales.

- Please include links to Pinterest accounts, boards, or case studies you have directly managed.



About HiEnd Accents



HiEnd Accents designs and creates everyday luxury bedding and linens, sheeting, decorative pillows and other home textiles. Founded in 2005 and based in Dallas, Texas, our mission is to elevate our customers' lives via beautifully designed home textiles that deliver quality and value.



As a family-owned business, we’re committed to personal service and long-term relationships. Through our four brands, we offer unique designs across a spectrum of styles and price points, all united by exceptional value. Combined with our customer-first approach, prompt shipping and low order minimums, we’ve become the preferred bedding supplier for thousands of top department stores, furniture retailers, interior designers, and boutique hotels nationwide. Recently recognized on the 2024 INC 5000 list as one of the fastest-growing businesses in the US, we continue to innovate and expand our reach in the home textiles market.



Discover more about us and our brands at [
](
).



Want to get to know us better and learn what it’s like to be part of our growing team in the Philippines? Learn more here: 



Why HiEnd Accents?



At HiEnd Accents, we're a close-knit team driven by entrepreneurial spirit, growth mindset, and a shared commitment to excellence. Our collaborative approach has propelled us to new heights – we're proud to be recognized on the 2024 INC 5000 list as one of the fastest-growing small companies in the United States. This achievement is a testament to our team's dedication and the exciting opportunities ahead. If you thrive in a vibrant, high-paced culture where your contributions truly matter, we want to hear from you!



Working at HiEnd Accents means that you can expect the following:



Competitive Compensation - We offer a highly competitive compensation package, including 13th Month Pay



Professional Growth - We invest in our people and make sure that they have the opportunity to continuously learn, grow, and develop their careers



Great Team of Like-Minded Professionals - We prioritize hiring based on culture and values, so you’re working with a team of folks who are as fun, talented, and committed as you are

We are seeking a full-time Senior Customer Service Representative to join our team! You'll be responsible for resolving all support inquiries and assisting in other miscellaneous tasks as needed. Must have 5+ years of related experience and be available to work 8am/9am to 5pm /6pm central time. Must include a resume upon applying.

Represent Lunchdrop in a professional, courteous manner

You'll be the first point of contact for any customer related concerns and are responsible for support tickets

Provide prompt resolution to issues

Work with various internal teams to identify and troubleshoot customer issues??



Additional administrative tasks

Assist with order confirmations

Communicating order changes to customers

Driver correspondence

Processing payments

title: Payroll & Financial Reporting Officer (Australia)
description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and reliable Payroll & Financial Reporting Officer to support payroll processing and financial reporting across our childcare group. This role is suited to someone with strong payroll compliance knowledge, solid accounting and bookkeeping skills, and experience working across multiple entities.



The position manages payroll using Employment Hero and supports financial reporting in Xero, including BAS, GST reconciliation, intercompany bookkeeping, billing, and wages reporting.



Skills & Requirements

• Strong experience in end-to-end payroll processing.

• Strong knowledge of Australian payroll legislation, awards, and compliance requirements.

• Experience with ATO submissions related to payroll.

• Strong accounting and bookkeeping knowledge.

• BAS and GST reconciliation experience for group accounts (mandatory).

• Experience with intercompany bookkeeping and multi-entity reporting.

• Intermediate to advanced Excel skills (formulas, pivots, reconciliations).

• High attention to detail and accuracy.

• Experience with Employment Hero (Payroll) and Xero (Financial Reporting).

• Strong time management and communication skills.





Key Responsibilities



Payroll Processing (Employment Hero)

• Prepare and process end-to-end payroll for all staff within set deadlines.

• Manage payroll adjustments, corrections, and payroll-related enquiries.

• Ensure accurate calculation of wages, leave, allowances, and deductions.

• Maintain accurate payroll records in line with awards and legislation.



Payroll Compliance & ATO Submissions

• Ensure compliance with Australian payroll legislation, awards, and Fair Work requirements.

• Prepare and support ATO submissions related to payroll.

• Assist with payroll audits and compliance reviews as required.



Superannuation & Payroll Tax

• Process superannuation contributions accurately and on time.

• Prepare monthly payroll tax calculations and assist with lodgements.

• Reconcile payroll tax across entities and reporting periods.



Financial Reporting & Bookkeeping (Xero)

• Support financial reporting using Xero.

• Assist with BAS preparation and GST reconciliation for a group of entities (mandatory).

• Maintain accurate bookkeeping records across multiple entities.

• Support fortnightly bookkeeping and reconciliations.



Intercompany Bookkeeping & Billing

• Manage intercompany bookkeeping for staff costs, agency costs, and shared expenses.

• Record casual staff costs and agency costs to correct intercompany accounts.

• Maintain accurate intercompany journals, balances, and reconciliations.

• Support intercompany billing and complex cost allocations.



Wages, P&L & Management Reporting

• Prepare wages reports for management and finance teams.

• Support P&L and wages analysis across centres and entities.

• Assist with internal reporting to support budgeting and cost control.



Agency Invoicing

• Match agency invoices against approved timesheets and rates.

• Liaise with agencies to resolve discrepancies.



The role may transition to a full-time position, subject to performance, adherence to rostered hours, and maintaining 100% attendance.



The working days are Monday to Wednesday, from 9:00 am to 2:00 pm Sydney time (6:00 am to 11:00 am Philippine time). This may change in case the client asks you to come in on some other days or extend your working hours.



We are seeking someone with sound knowledge of Australian bookkeeping who can work independently and learn at their own pace. Video training materials and SOPs will be provided. You can always check in with the finance manager if you have any questions or require clarification regarding your work.

title: GoHighLevel Specialist (GHL Specialist)
description:
NOTE: Only applications submitted through this form will be screened: 
/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc34-y2klKB40q6X4Pl3jtb6PlTCQSaLGY5zghxKEuBYyZUkQ/viewform?usp=header



ActivationAgents.ai is an AI-driven growth platform helping coaches, consultants, and online businesses generate revenue through AI-powered lead re-engagement and conversion systems. We work with fast-growing brands focused on authority, scale, and consistent inbound demand.



We’re hiring a Marketing Automations Specialist (GoHighLevel) to own and optimise the backend systems that power our marketing and revenue operations.



This role is ideal for someone who understands that automation isn’t just technical — it’s strategic. You’ll be responsible for building, maintaining, and improving automations that ensure leads are tracked correctly, workflows run smoothly, and data flows cleanly across our ecosystem.



This is a part-time role (20 hours/week) for someone who is detail-oriented, dependable, and comfortable owning marketing automation systems end-to-end.



Key Responsibilities



Build, maintain, and monitor automations using 

Set up and manage workflows, triggers, pipelines, and integrations inside Go High Level (GHL)

Implement and maintain accurate tracking using Google Analytics 4 (GA4)

Configure, test, and troubleshoot Google Tag Manager (GTM) events, tags, and triggers

Support campaigns with correct tracking, segmentation, and data flow

QA automation logic and troubleshoot broken workflows, misfires, and data mismatches

Manage integrations between GHL, 
, GA4, GTM, calendars, forms, landing pages,
, and messaging systems

Assist with reporting dashboards and performance visibility where required

Document systems, maintain SOPs, and keep backend architecture clean and scalable

Proactively identify opportunities to improve automation efficiency and reliability



Required Skills & Experience



1–2+ years experience with 
 (Integromat)

Strong working knowledge of Go High Level, including:Pipelines, Automation builder, Forms, calendars, tags, and campaigns

Experience implementing GA4 tracking and GTM configurations

Solid understanding of webhooks, APIs, and data mapping

Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to diagnose automation issues and identify root causes

Comfortable working independently and communicating clearly via Slack and Loom

High attention to detail and ability to follow structured processes

Experience with Zapier

Experience building or maintaining reporting dashboards (Looker Studio or similar)

Background in digital marketing, automation, or technical support roles

Familiarity with AI-driven workflows or CRM-based conversion systems

title: Cold Calling and Appointment Setter Specialist
description:
MUST SEND A 60 SECOND LOOM WITH YOUR EXPERIENCE TO BE CONSIDERED FOR POSITION!



We are seeking a motivated cold caller to join our team of passionate individuals. Your primary role will involve reaching out to potential clients and engaging them in meaningful conversations. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and love connecting with people, this opportunity is for you! We value teamwork and aim to achieve results together. Strong communication skills and a positive attitude are essential. Join us in making impactful calls and driving our business forward!



**Relevant Skills:**

- Strong verbal communication

- Active listening

- Persuasion and negotiation

- Time management

- Team collaboration

- CRM software familiarity

title: Meta Ads Specialist
description:
Role Overview: MUST SEND A 60 SECOND LOOM VIDEO TO BE CONSIDERED 



We are hiring a performance-driven Meta Ads Specialist who can also build and optimize high-converting funnels.



This role is for someone who understands that ads without funnels waste money, and funnels without traffic don’t matter. You will own the full acquisition pipeline—from first click to booked call or sale.



This is not a junior role. This is not a theory role. This is a results-only position.



Core Responsibilities

Meta Ads (Primary)



Plan, launch, optimize, and scale Meta 
 & Instagram) ad campaigns



Build campaigns using modern best practices (creative-led scaling, broad targeting, intelligent testing)



Write and test ad angles that hit pain points, objections, and urgency



Guide creative direction (hooks, UGC concepts, testimonials, offers)



Monitor and optimize key metrics:



CPL



CTR



CPM



Conversion rates



Frequency



Kill underperformers quickly and scale winners responsibly



Diagnose issues related to:



Creative fatigue



Offer mismatch



Tracking errors



Funnel drop-off



Funnel Building & Optimization



Build and optimize funnels that convert paid traffic into leads and booked calls



Create:



Opt-in pages



VSL pages



Booking pages



Thank-you pages



Build funnels inside platforms such as:



GoHighLevel



ClickFunnels



Webflow



Implement tracking:



Meta Pixel



Conversion API



Custom events



Optimize for:



Mobile experience



Load speed



Clean UX



Continuously test and improve conversion rates across the funnel



Required Skills & Experience



You must have real, verifiable experience.



Proven Meta Ads management with real ad spend and measurable results



Direct-response marketing mindset (leads, calls, revenue—not vanity metrics)



Funnel-building experience with live offers



Strong understanding of customer psychology and offer positioning



Ability to analyze data and explain decisions clearly



Comfortable owning outcomes—not just tasks



Personality Fit



This role is for someone who:



Is obsessed with performance and optimization



Thinks in systems, not silos



Communicates clearly and confidently



Takes responsibility when results dip



Tests fast, learns fast, and improves fast



This role is not for someone who needs constant direction or blames the algorithm.

title: Senior Meta Ads Media Buyer (Life Insurance Lead Generation)
description:
We are a U.S.-based life insurance lead generation company looking for a highly experienced Meta 
/Instagram) Ads Media Buyer to manage and scale paid campaigns.



This role is focused specifically on lead generation for final expense, mortgage protection, and life insurance products. You will be responsible for building, optimizing, and scaling campaigns that produce consistent, compliant, high-quality leads.



Responsibilities:

 • Launch, manage, and optimize Meta ad campaigns for lead generation

 • Build campaign structures (CBO/ABO), ad sets, and creative testing frameworks

 • Monitor CPL, conversion rates, and lead quality

 • Scale winning campaigns while maintaining performance

 • Work with funnels, landing pages, and CRM integrations (GoHighLevel preferred)

 • Ensure ads meet Meta and financial/insurance compliance standards

 • Provide weekly performance updates and recommendations



Requirements:

 • 5+ years running Meta ads

 • Strong English communication (written + verbal)

 • Proven experience in lead generation (insurance preferred)

 • Ability to manage multiple campaigns and budgets simultaneously

 • Strong understanding of tracking, pixels, and performance optimization

 • Experience working with U.S. markets

 • Self-starter, detail-oriented, and performance-driven



We are looking for someone highly skilled, well-trained, and focused on results — not beginners.

description:

???? Role Overview

Clients feel informed and confident

Smooth onboarding process



Upsells closed from happy clients



? Requirements

Have prior CSM or Account Manager experience

Be confident on Zoom calls

???? Do NOT Apply If:

You avoid client calls



You get overwhelmed easily



You wait for instructions instead of taking ownership

title: Graphic Designer — Fitness & Lifestyle Brands
description:
About the Company

We are Relentless Brands, a US-based health and wellness company operating three growing brands: ISI Elite Training (60-location fitness franchise), The Plunge House (cold plunge and recovery franchise), and Human Nutrition (performance nutrition brand). We are a fast-moving team that takes health and fitness seriously — and we want a designer on our team who does too.



About the Role

This is a remote, work-from-home position open to candidates based in the Philippines. We are looking for a graphic designer who is genuinely passionate about health, fitness, and wellness — not just someone who can design for it, but someone who lives it. Your passion should show in your portfolio and in how you talk about your work.

We are starting with a project-based trial — 12
 designs for an active campaign. If the quality is strong and we work well together, this grows into a full-time, long-term remote role.



Your Responsibilities



Design
 campaigns, social media graphics, digital ads, and marketing materials across three brands

Follow brand guidelines and maintain visual consistency across ISI Elite Training, The Plunge House, and Human Nutrition

Execute designs quickly with minimal revisions based on clear briefs

Collaborate with our US-based marketing team and communicate proactively

Meet deadlines consistently — we move fast and need someone who does too





Requirements



2+ years of graphic design experience

Portfolio that includes health, fitness, wellness, or lifestyle brand work — this is required, not preferred

Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator) and/or Canva Pro

Strong English communication skills (written and verbal)

Able to work and be available during US business hours (full or partial overlap)

Reliable internet connection and own equipment





Preferred But Not Required



Experience with
 design and platforms like Klaviyo or Mailchimp

Video editing or basic motion graphics

You personally work out, train, or are active in health and wellness — this matters to us





Compensation



Competitive rate based on experience and portfolio quality

Starting as a project-based engagement with strong potential for full-time

Long-term opportunity for the right person across a growing multi-brand company





How to Apply

Please send the following:



Your portfolio — must include fitness, health, or wellness design work

A short note (3–5 sentences) about your personal health and fitness lifestyle

Your monthly or hourly rate and your availability to start



We review applications quickly. Strong portfolios get fast responses.

title: VIdeo editor/ graphic designer
description:
???? How to Apply



Send ALL of the following:



1. Portfolio 



2. 1–2 minute Loom video intro



Your experience



Your editing style



Tools you use



3. WhatsApp number



???? Role Overview



We’re hiring a Graphic Designer / Video Editor to create high-quality social media content for coaching, credit, and business brands.



This role is for someone who understands:



Attention



Pacing



Clean design



Modern social content



You will be turning raw ideas, scripts, and footage into scroll-stopping posts.



???? Responsibilities



You will:



Edit short-form videos (Reels, TikTok, Shorts)



Create clean graphics (carousels, story slides, promo posts)



Add captions, hooks, on-screen text, and subtitles



Follow brand styles and templates



Repurpose long-form content into short clips



Hit fast turnaround times (same or next day when needed)



???? Editing Style We Want



Clean, modern, high-contrast



Clear captions (easy to read on mobile)



Strong hooks in first 2 seconds



Smooth pacing (no dead space)



Minimal but intentional effects



This is not over-edited TikTok fluff.



???? Tools You Should Know



CapCut or Premiere Pro (required)



Canva or Photoshop (required)



After Effects (bonus, not required)



Google Drive workflows



? Requirements



You MUST:



Have proven social media editing experience



Understand short-form content psychology



Take feedback well and iterate fast



Be reliable and consistent



Speak clear English



???? Do NOT Apply If:



You only do basic cuts



You rely on heavy templates only



You miss deadlines



You don’t understand social content pacing



???? What Success Looks Like



Content gets high retention



Hooks are strong



Clean visuals



Fast revisions



Consistent output without hand-holding

title: Social Media Manager - Real Estate
description:
Seeking a highly motivated and creative Virtual Assistant to spearhead social media for our growing real estate business.



We are looking for someone who understands branding, storytelling, and strategic content creation — not just posting. Our goal is to attract qualified web leads, increase brand awareness, and grow our presence across multiple platforms.



Key Responsibilities:



Develop and execute a cohesive social media strategy



Create and edit engaging content (Reels, short-form video, graphics, captions)



Post and schedule content consistently across Instagram, YouTube, TikTok,
, LinkedIn, and other relevant platforms



Research and implement trending SEO keywords and hashtags



Optimize content for reach, engagement, and lead generation



Monitor analytics and adjust strategy based on performance



Maintain brand voice, aesthetics, and messaging consistency



Ideal Candidate:



Experience in real estate marketing (preferred)



Strong understanding of Instagram, YouTube Shorts, and TikTok growth strategies



Skilled in video editing and short-form content



Knowledgeable in SEO and social media trends



Proactive, organized, and results-driven



Fluent in English with strong communication skills



Our goal is long-term growth, brand authority, and consistent lead generation. If you believe you are a great fit and can help us elevate our online presence, we would love to hear from you.



Please include examples of past work and results achieved.



We look forward to connecting.

title: Influencer Operations Manager
description:
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO:



Content Planning & Production Management

*Create and manage weekly and daily content schedules for:

**TikTok Shop product videos

**Personal brand content

*Organize filming days by content type (e.g., skincare days, makeup days, fashion days)

*Assign due dates to:

**Raw footage

**Edited videos

**Posting deadlines

*Ensure editors receive content on time and deliver edits on schedule



TikTok Shop Sample & Deadline Tracking

*Monitor TikTok Shop backend for:

**Sample requests

**Accepted samples

**Video due dates

*Track:

**Products received

**Videos still pending

**Extensions (when needed)

*Ensure creator is reminded before deadlines, not after

*Maintain ethical review timelines (allowing enough product testing time)



Brand Collaboration Management

*Screen inbound brand
s and collaboration requests both in
 inbox, Lark, Slack and in all TikTok inboxes multiple times a day

*Filter out:

**Scams

**Low-quality offers

**Brands that do not meet criteria

*Respond to qualified brands using approved templates:

**Send rate cards

**Enforce non-negotiable pricing

*Negotiate with brands to ensure highest pay possible and highest commission (Training provided)

*Review contracts using required clause checklist

*Send finalized contracts to creator for final approval

*Manage delivery timelines and approval workflows

*Handle brand communication during active collaborations:

**Deadline reminders

**Rush fee enforcement

**Approval requests

*Coordinate with bookkeeping on:

**Invoicing

**Payment follow-ups

Systems, Organization & Follow-Ups

*Maintain trackers for:

**Active collaborations

**Sample inventory

**Content plans

**Posting schedules

*Ensure SOPs are followed consistently

*Prevent repeat questions by:

*Referencing documentation

*Using trackers and notes effectively

*Proactively follow up with the creator and team when tasks are pending

*Persistent follow-ups “Pester when needed” to keep projects moving forward



Content Strategy Execution Support

*Ensure execution of:

**Content plans generated with the creator

**ChatGPT-supported ideation schedules

*Coordinate timelines between:

**Strategy

**Filming

**Editing

**Publishing

*Prepare content batches for cross-posting:

**TikTok

**Instagram Reels

*
 Reels

*Post and schedule videos on TikTok

*Coordinate with automation teams for ManyChat workflows (not building automations, but managing handoff)

*Set up ManyChat automations on Meta



Future Growth & Expansion Support

*Support rollout of:

**Spanish-language TikTok accounts using AI voice and lip-sync tools

**Multi-platform posting strategies

*Adapt workflows as AI tools and automation are introduced

*Help onboard and train future tea
mbers into established systems



EXPERIENCE AND SKILLS REQUIRED:

*3-5 years of proven project management and/or social media management experience

*Experience managing content creators, influencers, or social media operations

*Must not have his/her own Tiktok Shop (must not be a Tiktok Affiliate)

*Tiktok Shop Management experience is a huge plus

*Asana Project Management experience is a huge plus

*Strong organizational and tracking skills

*Comfortable working in fast-moving, high-volume environments



Experience handling:

*Contracts

*Brand communications

*Scheduling and deadline enforcement

*Confident in professional
 communication

*Able to manage multiple moving parts without losing details

*Comfortable reminding and following up assertively but professionally



TECH REQUIREMENTS

Computer - at least i5 or equivalent with 8gb RAM

Internet Speed - At least 50 MBPS Download speed



Job Type: Full-time (role will start Part-time but will be full time after 30 days)

Schedule: 9-5PM EST M-F // 10PM-6AM PHT

Salary Range: P50,000-65,000 monthly, Depending on experience



Application Instruction:

Fill out this form: 
/appqNAvkEQ10YFlc3/pag7mb9gbB6I03HS9/form

After submitting the form, click the apply button and send us a short message on why you would be a good fit for the role.

title: eBay Online Store Manager (Graphic Design Required)
description:
We are seeking a proactive and well?organized Online Store Manager to support and oversee our e?commerce operations across multiple platforms.



Role Overview

In this role, you will manage product listings, ensure smooth day?to?day store operations, assist with order coordination, and keep our online storefront visually appealing. A basic understanding of graphic design is important, as you will handle simple image edits, promotional visuals, and platform?specific adjustments.



Key Responsibilities

Oversee daily operations on various e?commerce marketplaces (Amazon, eBay, Shopee, and others)

Maintain accurate and up?to?date product listings

Edit product images and create basic promotional graphics when needed

Work closely with sales and marketing teams to improve store performance and visibility

Track inventory and assist with order processing

Prepare regular performance and sales reports





Requirements

Hands?on experience with e?commerce platforms such as Amazon, eBay, Shopee, etc.

Basic to intermediate graphic design skills (Photoshop, Canva, or similar tools)

Comfortable using Excel

Strong attention to detail and clear communication skills

Ability to manage tasks independently and meet deadlines

Dependable, organized, and consistent





What We Provide

Fully remote work arrangement

Friendly and supportive team culture

Opportunities for career growth and skill development

A chance to expand your e?commerce and design experience



Application Instructions

To apply, please respond with only the names of the platform(s) you have worked with (e.g., Amazon, eBay, Shopee).

Also include direct links to the store(s) you have managed.

No additional explanation is required.

title: CRM & Admin Assistant (Process-Focused | Part-Time | Remote)
description:
Hours: Part-time (5–10 hrs/week to start, with room to grow)



We’re hiring a reliable admin assistant to help with backend systems and data entry for a busy fitness studio. This role is process-driven — you’ll be following clearly documented steps rather than responding directly to students.



You’ll work mainly inside HubSpot, Mindbody, and

s (no student replies)

title: Experienced Bookkeeper (4+ years experience in full cycle role)
description:
We are looking for an experienced bookkeeper who excels in QuickBooks Online and is focused on providing high-level customer service. Sage 300 or Xero experience is an asset, but not required. The ideal candidate will be resourceful, with at least four years of experience managing multiple clients on QuickBooks Online. You’ll be part of a growing team where your expertise will help ensure smooth, accurate financial processes while delivering top-notch service to our clients. This role requires a blend of technical accounting skills, great communication, and the ability to take initiative when needed.



Key Responsibilities:



Bookkeeping: Handle data entry, reconciliations, and financial reporting using QuickBooks Online for multiple clients.

Client Management: Ensure excellent communication with clients, answering questions and addressing any concerns they may have about their financial records.

Resourcefulness: Demonstrate the ability to troubleshoot issues and research solutions independently when needed.

Financial Record Maintenance: Maintain accurate and organized financial records for all clients.



What We’re Looking For:



Experience: At least 4 years of experience managing multiple clients using QuickBooks Online.

Software Proficiency: Strong experience with QuickBooks Online.

Customer Service: A strong focus on providing high-level customer service and a proactive approach to client communication.

Resourcefulness: Ability to think critically and perform research when unsure about next steps or issues.

Attention to Detail: High level of accuracy in maintaining financial records and completing reconciliations.

Strong English Skills: Proficiency in reading, writing, and speaking English is required to communicate clearly with clients.



About You:



You are a highly organized, responsible, and customer-focused bookkeeper with at least 4 years of experience managing multiple clients on QuickBooks Online. You thrive in a fast-paced environment, are self-motivated, and take initiative when faced with challenges. You have a strong commitment to delivering excellent customer service while maintaining the highest level of accuracy in your work.



Application Requirements:



This position starts at 9 am Pacific Standard Time. Please note this time.



When applying, please include answers to the following questions:



Do you have at least 4 years of experience managing multiple clients using QuickBooks Online? Yes or No

Do you have experience with Canadian or US sales tax filing? Yes or No

Do you have experience with Canadian or US payroll? Yes or No

Do you consider yourself resourceful and able to research if you are unsure about how to proceed? Yes or No

Are you comfortable reading, writing, and speaking English? Yes or No



The ideal candidate will be able to work independently, prioritize tasks based on deadlines, and be a great team player.



Position is 40 hours per week.



Compensation based on experience.

title: Video Editor for E-commerce Brand
description:
We’re a DTC skincare eCommerce brand hiring a multi-skilled Video Editor to produce content for ads, social media, website, and
 (plus occasional packaging design support). This role also requires writing short English hooks/headlines.



Schedule & Pay:

- Mon–Fri, 9:00 AM–6:00 PM Philippine time

- $600/month

- Long-term, full-time role



Why Join Us?

- You will get access to premium tools like Higgsfield, Gemini, ChatGPT, etc plus training on how to use them.

- We are looking for a long-term tea
mber, not a freelancer.

- Great opportunity to build a portfolio with a fast-growing beauty brand.



What You’ll Do:

- Edit short-form videos (TikTok/Reels/Shorts), UGC + product-focused

- Create static creatives and simple motion ads (multiple variations)

- Edit product/lifestyle images (cleanup, retouching, resizing)

- Write/polish hooks, captions, and short ad descriptions in good English

Tools (Any Equivalent OK):

- CapCut/Premiere/Final Cut, Canva/Figma/Adobe, Google Drive + project tools. AI tools are a plus.



Requirements:

- Strong short-form editing and creative instincts

- Good design taste + basic image editing skills

- Good written English

- Can follow brand guidelines, take feedback, meet deadlines

- Reliable internet + capable computer



How to Apply (Required):

- Send us your portfolio/past works -> Short-Form Video (TikTok/Reels/Shorts)

- Send us your resume/CV

- Include a 30–90 sec video intro: your experience, tools (including AI), and why you’re a fit for the role



Hiring Process:

- Submit portfolio + resume + video intro

- Shortlisted applicants do a simple creative test

- Short video interview

- Offer to the best candidate

title: Video Editor & Image Designer
description:
ABOUT US 

We are a fast-growing DTC skincare eCommerce brand. We are looking for a long-term tea
mber, not a freelancer, who wants to build a stable career with us.



We believe in empowering our team. You will get access (and training!) on premium AI tools like Higgsfield, Gemini, and ChatGPT to make your workflow faster and more creative.



WHO YOU ARE 

We are looking for a "preditor" (Producer/Editor)—someone who understands storytelling, pacing, and marketing, not just button-pushing.



- You possess a "student mindset": You take feedback well, you don't take critiques personally, and you improve quickly. We are looking for someone who wants to learn and grow, not someone who thinks they already know everything.

- You are efficient: You can edit a high-quality 60-second video in 2-3 hours and create a social graphic in 1-2 hours without sacrificing quality.

- You are detail-oriented: You have 0% tolerance for typos in captions and overlays.

- You are tech-savvy: You are excited to use AI to generate ideas and speed up your work.



YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES

- Short-Form Video: Edit engaging Reels, Shorts, and TikToks (15–90 seconds) focused on UGC, products, and trends.

- Long-Form Video: Edit YouTube videos, and VSLs (5+ minutes) with clean pacing and storytelling.

- Engagement: Add animated captions, text callouts, B-roll, and visual hooks to keep retention high.

- Graphic Design: Create static ad creatives, quote cards, thumbnails, and simple motion ads.

- Photo Editing: Retouch, resize, and clean up product/lifestyle images.

- Copywriting: Write and polish short English hooks/headlines for your videos and ads.



TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS (Must Have)

- Computer Specs: You must have a PC capable of editing 4K footage and running Adobe Premiere Pro/After Effects without lag or crashing. (Recommended: 16GB+ RAM, SSD Storage).

- Internet Connection: You must have a reliable, high-speed internet connection (Fiber preferred). You will be required to download and upload large batches of raw 4K video files from Google Drive daily.

- Software: Proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro (preferred), CapCut, or Final Cut + Canva/Photoshop/Figma or equivalent.



WHY JOIN US? 

- Day Shift Schedule: Enjoy your evenings and weekends! Work normal PH business hours. 

- AI Training: We pay for the tools and teach you how to use them. 

- Stability: We are looking for a partner for the long haul. 

- Portfolio: Build a portfolio with a professional beauty brand.



Schedule & Pay:

- Mon–Fri, 9:00 AM–6:00 PM Philippine time

- $600/month



HOW TO APPLY (Read Carefully) 

To ensure you are paying attention to detail, applications that do not follow these steps will be ignored.



Please reply to this job post with the subject line: "Creative Editor - [Your Name]" and include the following:

- Your video introduction.

- Your Portfolio: A link to your best work. Please highlight Short-Form Videos (TikTok/Reels).

- Your updated resume.



Hiring Process:

1. Submit Application

2. Shortlisted candidates do a simple creative test

3. Short video interview

4. Job Offer



We look forward to meeting you!

This role requires direct experience working in a U.S. collection agency environment, deep knowledge of U.S. debt collection regulations, and the ability to independently manage accounts from intake through resolution.



The ideal candidate is highly organized, compliance-driven, and comfortable using GoHighLevel daily to track accounts, automate follow-ups, and manage communication workflows.



Note: We’re only processing applications submitted through the form.

Form link: 



Key Responsibilities:



-Manage the full-cycle U.S. collections process, including:

-Client onboarding and account intake

-Skip tracing and debtor research

-Outbound and inbound collection calls, SMS, and
 follow-ups

-Payment posting, reconciliation, and documentation



Note: We’re only processing applications submitted through the form.

Form link: 



Hands-on daily use of GoHighLevel (GHL) to:



-Manage pipelines and account stages

-Automate SMS,
, and call workflows

-Ensure strict compliance with U.S. federal and state regulations, including FDCPA and TCPA

Note: We’re only processing applications submitted through the form.

title: Sales Representative
description:
Join a fast-growing US online home goods retailer and enjoy the learning and opportunities that you have while working with us.



We strive to provide 5-star service & shopping assistance to all of our clients, and all of our team is accountable to fulfill this.



We are looking for a Sales Representative who can assist prospective buyers and close online ecommerce sales.



We're only looking for full-time, long-term, ongoing cooperation.



Work schedules available:

8 AM to 4 PM US EST

4 PM to 12 AM US EST



Your work week will be 5 days per week, with 2 days off per week. Days off will be selected with your manager. We will try to accommodate your preferences for which days you like, based on availability.



This role starts ASAP!!



Job Duties and Responsibilities:

Receive incoming phone calls and live chats from potential customers (prospects) who indicated that they need shopping assistance. This does not include calls and chats from existing customers that need help with their orders (that’s a job for a different department)

Makes follow-up calls, writes follow-up
s, and text messages to potential buyers. We try to follow up 5x with each person that contacted us (unless they indicate that they are no longer interested). We don’t do cold calling. Only reaching out to prospects who interacted with our online store and left their contact information.

After each interaction with a prospect/customer, writes notes & comments in our CRM (Asana)

Communicate efficiently and build rapport with potential customers

Assists prospects in their shopping journey and helps make the purchase decision

Ensures that all prospects’ questions and objections are addressed

Leads every interaction to a close sale, which means an order is placed on our online store

Prepares custom quotes, price matches competitors if necessary, and offers custom discounts. This requires calculating margins & ensuring profitability.

Answering questions about the products we offer, including technical questions. Learns the specifications, features and benefits of our bestsellers. Over time, becomes an expert in the industry.

If not able to answer product-specific questions, conducts research in the materials provided by the supplier, or reaches out to the supplier to get the information

Confirms stock availability and lead times when offering products to prospects

Documents standard procedures and best practices in a written form, so that other tea
mbers can learn from them



Requirements:

At least 2 years of experience in sales on the phone

Experience must include both inbound and outbound sales

Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

Experience in Customer Service on the phone is a nice to have

Experience in the e-commerce (online shopping) industry is nice to have

Home improvement, construction, and gas plumbing industry experience is a plus

Outgoing, friendly, and lively

Can-do mindset, with a sense of ownership, pride in your performance, and its impact on the company’s success

Long-term commitment - treat this as your career



What we can offer:

Sales commission: 8% of gross profit from all orders closed. Gross profit means the sale amount minus the product and shipping costs. Paid monthly. No upper limit. Monthly commission payouts range between $1,200 (the guaranteed minimum) and as high as $3,000 (for the top performer). The average monthly payout is $1,465 (average from the last 2 years).

$1,200/month minimum guaranteed pay

15 days paid days off per year (also convertible to min. guaranteed commission)

Paid training on all aspects of the role

Opportunities for professional development

Friendly atmosphere

Online Interview process

Fully remote position

title: Facebook ad Video editor
description:
Video Editor – High-Converting Meta Ads | E-Commerce | Remote

We run multiple e-commerce brands and we're scaling fast. We need a video editor who lives and breathes direct-response — someone who understands that every frame has a job to do, and that job is to sell.

This isn't a creative passion project. It's performance-driven work where your edits are measured against real results — clicks, conversions, and revenue.



What This Role Looks Like



Remote, anywhere in the world

Per-ad compensation — you're paid for output, not hours

5–10 ads per week — fast-paced but sustainable if you have a system

Ongoing work with room to grow as we scale





What You'll Be Doing



Editing short-form video ads (20–60 seconds) built to stop the scroll and drive purchases

Turning raw UGC footage into polished, high-performing creatives

Building strong hooks, tight pacing, and visual storytelling that moves people to act

Sourcing B-roll and reference clips from TikTok, Adspy, and Pipiads

Adding captions, SFX, music, and transitions that feel native to the feed

Using 11 Labs for voiceovers and audio — this is a core part of the workflow, not a nice-to-have

Collaborating on creative angles and scripts when needed

Staying current on what's winning in direct-response and short-form content





You're the Right Fit If:



You have a real portfolio of Meta or TikTok ads — not just general video work

You've edited UGC content specifically, and you know how to make it feel authentic while still converting

You're fluent in CapCut, Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or DaVinci Resolve

You've used 11 Labs in actual client or brand projects

You're familiar with Claude AI for scripting and ideation

You work fast without cutting corners — speed is part of the skill set here

You don't need hand-holding on briefs. You can take a concept and run with it



This isn't for you if you need weeks of feedback cycles, prefer slow methodical editing, or don't have proven ad experience specifically.



How to Apply

Start your message with the word "STORM" — applications without it won't be reviewed.

Then answer the following:



Have you edited ads for an e-commerce brand? Name the product type, your role, and what the ads were trying to accomplish.

Share your portfolio. Which piece are you most proud of — and what made it work?

Walk us through one ad from brief to final cut. What was the challenge, and how did you solve it?

How have you used 11 Labs? Be specific — what projects, what use case, what result?





We move fast and we respond to strong applicants quickly. If your work is good, you'll hear from us.

title: Welcome to K-POP Universe: Office Admin Role (Entry-Level) for E-Commerce – Join the Beat!
description:
- Recruitment validity period: Until 3 business days from the date of the first recruitment announcement

- A PH VA team of more than 5 people has already been formed, and business collaboration is possible using Tagalog in a comfortable atmosphere.

- Providing educational tutorial videos and operating a mentorship program to help new comers quickly adapt



[About Us]

* Company Introduction (Video):

youtu.be/dO2mWWZANx8



[Join Summitree and Write Your K-POP Legacy Alongside Filipinos]

Summitree envisions leveraging their Filipino employees' intelligence and English fluency to expand globally while sharing their passion for K-POP. They highlight the Philippines' crucial role in their expansion plans, emphasizing collaboration with their Filipino team to make a mark in the K-POP world. Joining Summitree means joining a multicultural team (Korea, Philippines, Mongolia, Others) with a shared goal of making K-POP history.



[Responsibilities]

We are looking for a “Full-Time” Office Admin to handle our business.

You will be doing a variety of tasks, almost all of which we will create tutorials for you.

1. Order fulfillment and shipping label generation

You will be responsible for gathering and processing customer orders accurately and efficiently. This includes coordinating with third-party logistics (3PL) providers for inbound and outbound shipments to ensure smooth operations.

2. Product listing and scheduling

As a distributor of K-POP records and merchandise, you will be involved in registering new products into our system. This includes managing inventory, updating product information, and ensuring accurate data entry. Additionally, you will be responsible for scheduling release dates and managing timelines using tools like Google Calendar.

3. Customer service support

providing excellent customer service is crucial to us. You will be responsible for addressing customer inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Your communication skills and problem-solving abilities will play a vital role in maintaining strong relationships with our valued customers.



[Required qualifications & skillset (must have)]

* Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

* Experience in puchasing K-POP Album or knowledge of K-POP related products (album, merchandise)

* Idea of how to promote K-POP albums and gain traffics in our shopping mall in PH online K-POP community for each artists



[Desired qualifications & skillset (nice to have)]

* Experience in handling customer service

* Experience in Photoshop

* Experience in
 Ads or Google Ads

* Knowledge and Experience of Microsoft Excel & Familar with Using Various Formula

* Experience in experience in Amazon Business (Familiar with Interface and function) or other E-commerce Platform



[Compensation & Employment Terms]

Position Classification:

This is an entry-level position. All candidates, regardless of prior experience, will undergo structured training under a designated mentor to adapt to our internal systems and operational standards.



• Payment Term: Monthly basis

• Probationary Period: 6 months

title: Meta Ads & Automation Assistant
description:
I run a growing life insurance lead generation company that manages Meta ad campaigns, automation systems, and lead distribution for life insurance agents. I already know how to do everything listed below, I’m hiring because we are scaling and I need a reliable, long-term VA to help manage and maintain systems. Someone that will grow with the company and help manage future VA teams.



This role combines Meta Ads support, GoHighLevel automation, 
 scenarios, and client management. While finding someone that can do all of these would be a huge help, I understand it is a lot to ask for. So, I am mostly looking for someone that can take the most amount of these tasks off my hands, however much possible.



You will be working directly with me and inside our team 
.



What You’ll Be Doing



Meta Ads Support

 • Assist with creating and managing Meta ad campaigns

 • Set and monitor daily budgets, spending limits, and caps

 • Understand campaign structure (CBO, ABO, testing vs scaling)

 • Work with Andromeda experience (preferred)

 • Flag issues like high CPLs, rejected ads, or pacing problems

 • Coordinate with our designer/VA on ad creatives and copy



Automation & Systems

 • Build and manage GoHighLevel automations

 • Create and maintain 
 (Integromat) scenarios

 • Send alerts when:

 • Clients are low on ad spend

 • Campaigns start/end

 • Leads hit certain thresholds



 Integrate:

 • Meta

 • GHL

 • 

 • Google Sheets reporting

 • Assist with LeadProsper lead distribution

 • Potentially help migrate some lead flows from LeadProsper into GHL



Bonus (Not Required but Big Plus)



Lead Distribution Experience

 • Insurance or Financial Services Background



Client Management Experience

 • Send and manage client invoices

 • Track ad spend and balances

 • Help answer basic questions in team 

 • Assist with troubleshooting and internal documentation



Team Management Softwares

 • 
, ClickUp, etc...



Who This Role Is For

 • You are technical, not just task-based

 • You understand marketing systems, not just clicking buttons

 • You can follow processes and help improve them

 • You are comfortable learning and asking questions

 • You want long-term, stable work, not short gigs



Who This Role Is NOT For

 • Beginners with no Meta Ads or automation experience

 • People who need step-by-step hand-holding forever

 • Anyone juggling too many clients already



Required Skills

 • Meta Ads Manager experience

 • GoHighLevel (workflows, triggers, pipelines)

 • 
 (Integromat)

 • Basic Google Sheets

 • 
 communication

 • Strong English reading & writing

 • Attention to detail



Hours & Growth

 • Starting part-time (10–20 hrs/week)

 • Opportunity to grow into full-time

 • Pay increases based on responsibility and performance

 • Long-term role, I want ONE person that can become my right-hand, not turnover



How to Apply



In your application, please answer:

 1. What tools from this job have you used hands-on?

 2. Which part of this role are you strongest in?

 3. Have you worked with Meta Ads budgets and caps before?

Applications that don’t answer these will be skipped.

title: Outbound Sales Representative (Work From Home)
description:
About Us



We’re a high-energy team driven by big goals and real results. We’re looking for motivated individuals who are ready to take ownership of their careers, thrive in a fast-paced environment, and turn effort into measurable success. If you’re ambitious, driven, and enjoy seeing your hard work pay off, this could be the right opportunity for you.



About the Role



As an Outbound Sales Representative, you will engage potential customers through outbound cold calls, introducing them to our premium products and services. Your role is to understand each customer’s needs, explain how our solutions can add value, and guide them toward the right fit.



This position is about real conversations, active listening, and building trust—whether you’re connecting with a new prospect or following up with an existing lead.



What You’ll Be Doing



Learning and mastering our premium products and services



Conducting outbound cold calls and follow-ups with confidence and professionalism



Creating positive, lasting impressions with every interaction



Representing the company as a reliable and trustworthy brand ambassador



Building genuine relationships with customers



Consistently meeting and exceeding sales targets with the support of our training and team



What We’re Looking For



Strong Communication Skills: Clear, confident, and persuasive



Positive Attitude & Professionalism: Friendly, approachable, and polished



People-Oriented: Naturally builds rapport and trust



Quick Thinker: Able to adapt, problem-solve, and stay calm under pressure



Organized & Goal-Driven: Excellent time management and self-discipline



Results-Motivated: You are driven by performance-based earnings and career growth



Requirements:



Personal PC or laptop



Professional headset



Stable, reliable internet connection



Why Join Us?



Work From Home: Fully remote position—save time and commuting costs while working comfortably from home



Career Growth: We promote from within and are looking for future leaders and team managers



Attractive Compensation: Uncapped commissions, performance bonuses, and incentives for top performers



Training & Mentorship: Ongoing support to help you succeed and grow



Positive Team Culture: Supportive environment that celebrates wins and values collaboration



To Be Considered for an Interview



Please submit a voice recording introducing yourself and answering the following:



Why should you be considered for this position?



What experience do you have with cold calling or outbound sales?



Do you have any background in the telecommunications industry?



If you’re ready to challenge yourself, grow quickly, and be part of an exciting, results-driven team, we’d love to hear from you.

Apply now and our HR team will be in touch shortly.

title: Property Management Assistant
description:
Company Overview



Tyco Property Management Company is a family-owned property management firm based in San Diego, California. We have been in continuous operation since 1966 and specialize in providing high-touch service to homeowners associations, as well as residential and commercial properties.



Learn more about us here:





We have worked successfully with remote tea
mbers for several years and have well-established systems, processes, and training in place.



Position Overview



This position supports homeowners associations only and does not involve commercial or residential rental property management.



We are seeking a full-time, long-term remote tea
mber to support our HOA management team as a Property Management Assistant.



This role is ideally intended for candidates who already have experience working with homeowners associations. This is not an entry-level role. A candidate without HOA experience would be considered, but they would need to have considerable property management experience.



This is not a short-term contract position.



Key Responsibilities



• Respond to homeowner
s and service requests

• Document notes and correspondence in our HOA management system

• Coordinate with vendors and follow up on work orders

• Assist with board packets, reports, and notices

• Support compliance tracking, mailings, and administrative HOA tasks

• Communicate professionally with homeowners, board members, and vendors



Systems and Training



• We use Vantaca, a modern HOA management CRM with a full training library

• Microsoft Teams is used for internal communication

• A shared company inbox is used for
 management

• RingPlan is used for phone calls with homeowners and vendors

• We are experienced in training and integrating remote tea
mbers quickly



You do not need prior experience with our specific systems.



Work Schedule



• Monday through Friday

• 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Pacific Time

• Lunch and breaks as needed



Requirements



• Experience working with homeowners associations or a strong property management background

• Strong written English and professional communication skills

• Organized, detail-oriented, and calm under pressure

• Comfortable handling homeowner and vendor communication

• Comfortable working US business hours

• Looking for a long-term role with an established company



Compensation and Benefits



• Competitive base hourly pay paid directly

• Bonus compensation paid quarterly and annually based on performance

• Paid US holidays on the same schedule as our US staff, approximately 10 to 12 paid holidays per year

• Paid time off that increases with tenure

• PTO is use-it-or-lose-it and does not roll over

• Any unused PTO is paid out in the December paycheck

• Paid birthday off

• Raises based on performance and longevity

• Long-term stability with a company operating for nearly 60 years



HOW TO APPLY



Follow the steps exactly to be considered.



• Use a minimum of 5 AP points

• Include the following subject line: YOUR NEW PROPERTY MANAGEMENT ASSISTANT



Please apply with a brief message that includes:



• Your experience working with homeowners associations in any capacity

• Your resume

• How long you typically stay in roles

• Why you are interested in a long-term position with an established company

• Confirmation that you understand we will not hire applicants who are working with other companies, as this is a full-time position that must be your number one priority

• Confirmation that you understand the working hours are Monday through Friday, 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Pacific Time

• DISC testing results

• Confirmation whether you used any AI tools to help write your application. This will not disqualify you. We simply value transparency.



Qualified candidates will receive a calendar link to schedule a Zoom interview with the CEO and Director of HOA Management.

title: Social Media Manager at Market Leaders
description:
Social Media Manager at Market Leaders (Industry Titans)


/testimonial-page



Who We Are

Market Leaders (Industry Titans) helps established coaches, consultants, and service providers become industry authorities using modern AI and marketing strategies. Founded by Bryan Ang and Melvin Soh, we're a Singapore-based company working with ambitious entrepreneurs globally.



Our positioning is unique: Asian roots, global reach—we bring world-class marketing education with cultural authenticity. We're building toward becoming a world-renowned brand by 2031, and social media is a critical growth lever.



Our culture? Peaceful & Profitable—high performance without toxic hustle, zero drama, and a team-first mentality.



The Opportunity

Most companies want social media managers who post pretty content and chase vanity metrics.



We need a growth-driven strategist who turns followers into clients.



You won't just be scheduling posts. You'll be engineering social campaigns that build authority, drive engagement, and convert business owners into high-ticket clients. Your work directly impacts how entrepreneurs building 6–7 figure businesses discover and engage with us.



This role combines three rare skills:

AI mastery for scaling content production efficiently



Paid advertising expertise optimizing campaigns that convert



Community building creating relationships that drive real business results



If you can turn social platforms into client-generating assets while embodying our "Never Stop Evolving" and "High Performance, Zero Drama" values, this is your role.



What You'll Do



Content Creation & Strategic Execution (40%)

Create daily social posts across platforms that educate, engage, and convert

Design scroll-stopping graphics and visual content in Canva

Write compelling captions and copy that drive action

Repurpose existing content for maximum social distribution

Use AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude) to scale production without sacrificing quality



Community Building & Engagement (25%)

Respond to comments and DMs daily, building genuine relationships

Monitor brand mentions and join relevant conversations

Foster community growth through authentic interaction

Identify and engage with potential clients and partners



Paid Advertising & Conversion (20%)

Run and optimize paid social campaigns (Meta, LinkedIn)

Test ad creatives, copy, and audiences systematically

Manage ad budgets and maximize ROI

Track performance and iterate based on data



Analytics & Continuous Improvement (15%)

Track performance metrics weekly and identify trends

Analyze what's working and double down

Implement data-driven improvements

Collaborate with Content Director (Morgan) and Copywriter (Collen) on campaigns

Report insights to CMO (Bryan Ang)



What You Bring

Must-Haves (Non-Negotiable)







Experience & Proof

2+ years managing social media professionally (B2B/business content preferred)

Portfolio required showing account growth, engagement metrics, and campaign results

Proven track record growing accounts and driving measurable business outcomes



Technical Skills

Strong copywriting for social captions and posts

Proficient in Canva and graphic design fundamentals

Hands-on experience running paid social ads (Meta/LinkedIn)

Data analysis skills—you can read metrics, spot trends, and optimize accordingly

Comfortable with AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude) to work smarter and faster



Work Style & Culture Fit

Never Stop Evolving: You learn something new every day and apply it immediately

High Performance, Zero Drama: Professional, reliable, no ego, no excuses

Self-starter who works independently without constant direction

Available for Singapore time zone overlap (GMT+8)

Reliable internet and professional workspace



Nice-to-Haves

Experience in coaching/consulting/education industries

Video editing skills

Understanding of Asian business culture + global markets

Experience with scheduling platforms (Buffer, Hootsuite, etc.)



Why Market Leaders?



Peaceful & Profitable Culture

We believe in world-class results without burnout. You'll work hard and smart, but we respect boundaries and sustainable performance.



Remote-First Flexibility

Work from anywhere in the Philippines. Async collaboration with clear communication norms.



Learn While You Earn

You're joining a marketing education company. You'll be immersed in cutting-edge strategies, AI tools, and world-class marketing thinking daily.



Growth Path

As we scale toward our 2031 mission, high performers grow with us. This role can evolve into Social Media Director, Growth Lead, or other leadership opportunities.



Team Culture

Small team (7 people), big impact. You'll work directly with Bryan (CMO), Morgan (Content Director), and Collen (Copywriter). Quarterly team celebrations and genuine collaboration.



Compensation & Support

Base Salary: SGD $800–1,000/month (based on experience)

Canva Pro subscription provided

AI tools access (ChatGPT, Claude)

Marketing tools and software provided



Our Hiring Process

We respect your time. Here's exactly what to expect:

Application + 3 Quick Tasks (60–90 min total)

60-Second Video Introduction (be yourself, show your energy)

Zoom Interview (60 min with Bryan and team—culture + role fit)

Reference Check (we'll verify with past managers)

Welcome to the Team!



Timeline: We review weekly and respond within 3–5 days. Top candidates hear back in 48 hours.



Apply Now :

title: Media Buyer at Market Leaders
description:

Company: Market Leaders

Location: Remote (Philippines/Anywhere)

Compensation:
SGD




/testimonial-page





Who We Are



Market Leaders is on a mission: become a world-renowned coaching and marketing education brand by 2031. That's 2,200 days from today.



We're not your typical "hustle culture" startup. We're Asian roots, global reach—think Bruce Lee's philosophy applied to business education. We prove that "Peaceful & Profitable" isn't just a tagline; it's how we operate. High performance, zero drama. World-class results without burning out our team.

The Opportunity



We're looking for our Growth Architect—the person who will scale our VSL (Video Sales Letter) campaigns profitably and sustainably.



You won't just "run

This role is critical. Without profitable acquisition, nothing else matters. With it, we change lives globally.



Growth path: Start managing 2?3K/day in ad spend, scale over 12 months. As we grow, so does your responsibility—potentially building and leading a growth team.
