title: Product Lister (Shopify + AI Images)
description:
We are a fast-growing e-commerce company operating Shopify stores across multiple markets. We work with a long-term vision, strong brand standards, and a team-first mindset. This is not “just a VA role” — we work closely together, value feedback, and offer room for growth when the collaboration goes well.



The Role:

We’re looking for a full-time Product Lister who can work accurately and efficiently at scale, following clear SOPs and fixed brand standards.



What You Will Do: 

Product Listing & Imports

• Import products into Shopify using supplier tools, apps, feeds, or CSV files

• Set up clean product structures (variants, collections, tags, metafields)

• Maintain accuracy and consistency across product data



Product Content

• Write product descriptions in our brand style (fully documented in SOPs)

• Translate product content when required (manual or AI-assisted)

• Fill in metafields, attributes, and required product data fields



Product Images & AI Models

• Work with one fixed background provided by us

• Use three fixed AI models provided by us

• Use AI tools and/or Canva — your workflow is flexible, but the output must be consistent

• Ensure images follow the same visual standard across all listings.



Quality:

A product is “done” when data is correct, visuals match the real product, and listings look consistent.

After onboarding, you should be comfortable handling ~35–45 products per day without quality loss.



Who You Are:

- Detail-oriented and accuracy-driven

- Comfortable with repetitive work at scale

- Able to follow SOPs exactly

- Reliable, structured, and team-minded



Requirements:

- Shopify product listing experience

- Familiar with variants, metafields, and product data

- Experience with Canva and/or AI tools for product images

- Good written and spoken English

- Stable internet connection



What We Offer:

- Full-time, long-term position

- Clear SOPs and expectations

- Team-oriented culture

- Room for growth and responsibility

- Performance-based bonus structures



How to Apply:

Start your application with “Consistency” and include:



1: Short introduction about yourself + Shopify product listing experience

2: Examples of product pages or stores you worked on

3: Experience + examples with AI-generated product images

4: Your availability

5: Screenshot of your internet speed



Applications that don’t follow these steps will not be reviewed!

title: Shopify Product Lister (AI Product Images)
description:
About Us

We are a fast-growing e-commerce company operating Shopify stores across different markets. We work with a clear long-term vision: building scalable, high-quality stores with strong brand consistency.

We don’t see this as “just a VA role”. We work as a team, we stand next to each other, and we believe everyone plays an equal role in achieving our goals. There is room for feedback, initiative, growth, and responsibility. If the collaboration goes well, the role can broaden over time.

 

The Role

We are looking for a full-time Product Lister who can work accurately, consistently, and efficiently at production scale.

This is an operational role with clear SOPs and standards. Your focus is on:

• clean product imports and setup in Shopify

• accurate product content (based on SOPs)

• consistent product images using our fixed brand standard

 

What You Will Do: 

Product Listing & Imports

• Import products into Shopify using supplier tools, apps, feeds, or CSV files

• Set up clean product structures (variants, collections, tags, metafields)

• Maintain accuracy and consistency across product data



Product Content

• Write product descriptions in our brand style (fully documented in SOPs)

• Translate product content when required (manual or AI-assisted)

• Fill in metafields, attributes, and required product data fields



Product Images & AI Models

• Work with one fixed background provided by us

• Use three fixed AI models provided by us

• Use AI tools and/or Canva — your workflow is flexible, but the output must be consistent

• Ensure images follow the same visual standard across all listings

 



Quality Standard

A product listing is considered “done” when:

• product data is accurate and complete

• visuals correctly represent the real product

• there are no visible differences in quality, layout, or structure compared to other listings

 

Speed & Consistency

After onboarding, you should be comfortable handling approximately 35-45 products per day, without visible quality differences between listings.

This is not a role where each product is treated as a one-off creative project—consistency matters.

 

Who You Are

• Highly detail-oriented and accuracy-driven

• Comfortable working with repetitive tasks at scale

• Able to follow SOPs and guidelines exactly

• Reliable, structured, and process-minded

• Able to work independently while being part of a team

• Comfortable giving and receiving feedback

 

Required Experience

• Experience with Shopify product listings and imports

• Experience working with product data, variants, and metafields

• Experience using Canva and/or AI tools for product images

• Strong attention to visual and data accuracy

• Good written & spoken English

• Stable internet connection

 

What We Offer

• Full-time, long-term position

• Clear SOPs, expectations, and feedback loops

• A team-oriented culture where everyone contributes equally

• Room for initiative, responsibility, and growth

• Opportunity to broaden the role if the collaboration works well

• Attractive bonus structures based on performance and results

• Stable workload and long-term collaboration mindset

 

How to Apply

We want to be respectful of your time, but we also want to understand how you work and what level of quality you deliver.

Please read this carefully — applications that don’t follow the steps below will not be reviewed.

Start your application with the word “Consistency”.

Please include:

1. A short introduction about yourself

2. Your experience with Shopify product listing 

3. Examples of product pages or stores you worked on

4. Experience and examples with AI-generated e-commerce images

5. Answer the folowing question: When comparing supplier images with AI-generated product images, what are the first things you check to make sure the product is still accurately represented?

6. Your availability 

7. A screenshot of your internet speed (Speedtest or similar)

title: Quoting /Estimating / Scope of Work
description:
Construction Estimator / Quantity Takeoff Specialist (Canadian & US Projects) – Full Time Remote

Overview



We are a growing Canadian construction and building envelope company seeking a highly skilled Construction Estimator to join our team full-time.   Mainly doing smaller projects with no plans to read, but photos and measurements.



This is a long-term, stable position for someone who is experienced in:



• Quantity takeoffs

• Scope writing

• Quote preparation

• Construction pricing



You MUST be familiar with Canadian and/or US construction methods, materials, and pricing structures.



This is not a beginner role. We are looking for someone who understands construction and can think independently.



Our projects include:



• Decks and waterproofing (vinyl membrane)

• Building envelope repairs

• Exterior renovations

• General carpentry

• Commercial and residential work



Your Responsibilities



You will work directly with ownership and project management to:



Estimating



• Perform material quantity takeoffs from plans and drawings

• Read architectural, structural, and shop drawings

• Analyze project specifications

• Identify missing scope items



Scope Writing



• Write clear, detailed scopes of work

• Break projects into logical phases

• Ensure nothing is missed



Quote Preparation



• Prepare professional quotes for clients

• Compile labour, materials, equipment, and subcontractor costs

• Apply markups and pricing strategies



Cost Research



• Research material costs

• Research labour costs

• Help maintain pricing databases



Support Project Planning



• Assist with budgeting

• Help identify cost risks

• Help improve estimating systems



Required Experience



You MUST have experience in:



• Construction estimating

• Quantity takeoffs

• Reading construction drawings

• Construction scope writing



AND be familiar with:



• Canadian or US construction methods

• Imperial measurements (feet, inches)

• North American building materials





Required Skills



You must be:



• Extremely detail-oriented

• Reliable

• Honest

• Efficient

• Able to work independently

• Able to meet deadlines



Strong English is required.



Work Schedule



Full Time

Monday to Friday

9:00 AM – 5:00 PM

Pacific Time (Vancouver, Canada)



Compensation



Based on experience.



Long-term position with opportunity for raises.



Why This Is a Great Job



• Stable, long-term position

• Work directly with experienced construction professionals

• Growing company with lots of work

• Opportunity to grow into senior estimating role



How to Apply



To be considered, include:



Your experience with construction estimating



What estimating software you have used



Examples of projects you have estimated



Your expected monthly salary (full time)



AND include the word:



"MAPLE"



at the top of your application so we know you read this job post.





Bonus Experience (Not Required but Valuable)



• Canadian construction experience

• Building envelope projects

• Waterproofing / roofing / decks

• Working with North American contractors

title: Video Editor
description:
Hiring a full-time social media manager (40 hours a week) to edit, prepare, and schedule short-form content across all various social media platforms. The goal is to post three times a day.



In order to be considered you must create a video less than 60 seconds explaining why we should hire you. 



And make sure to say banana at any time in the video.

title: SaaS Product Builder — Help Us Launch SpeakerAgent.AI (Full-Time, Path to CTO)
description:
We're Launching a SaaS. Come Build It With Us.

SpeakerAgent.AI is a brand-new platform for professional speakers — and we're right on the edge of launch. The dashboard is built. We're in the testing phase. We already have subscribers ready to pay. What we need now is a builder who's ready to jump in the trenches with us, tie up the loose ends, and help us ship this thing.

Here's what makes this different from every other dev job posting you'll see today: you won't be writing code by hand. We build with Claude Code and Vercel v0 — AI tools that handle 90%+ of the actual coding and development work. Your job is to manage the process, direct the tools, and make sure what comes out the other end actually works and ships.

Think of it as being a technical project manager who also gets their hands dirty. You point the AI in the right direction, review what it builds, test it, fix what's broken, and keep the project moving forward.



What You'll Be Doing

Right Now (Launch Phase)



Jump into our existing codebase and get familiar with what we've already built

Work alongside the founder to knock out the remaining features and fixes before launch

Test, debug, and polish the platform for paying customers

Help manage the deployment pipeline (we use Vercel)



After Launch (Growth Phase)



Build new features based on customer feedback and our product roadmap

Optimize performance, fix bugs, and keep the platform stable

Help implement integrations with third-party tools and services

Take increasing ownership of the technical side of the product



Long-Term (Leadership Phase)



Grow into the CTO role — this is the first and hopefully only person we hire for this track

Own the technical vision and architecture of the platform

Eventually have a compensation package and equity/partnership opportunity that reflects your value





Who We're Looking For

We're being intentionally open with this role because the AI tools do the heavy lifting. That said, here's what will put you at the top of our list:

Strong Candidates Will Have:



Some development experience (even self-taught counts — show us what you've built)

Familiarity with Next.js, React, or modern JavaScript frameworks

Experience with any AI coding tools — Claude Code, Claude Cowork, Cursor, GitHub Copilot, etc.

Comfort working in a terminal/command line environment

Project management instincts — you can juggle priorities and keep things on track



Also Great:



Experience building or maintaining a SaaS product

Automation experience (n8n, Zapier, Make)

Understanding of APIs, databases, and deployment workflows

Any experience with Vercel, Supabase, or similar platforms



What Matters Most:



You're not scared of launching something — you thrive in the messy, fast-moving early stages

You can figure things out without someone holding your hand

You enjoy building products, not just completing tickets

You communicate clearly and often — no disappearing acts

You want to grow with a company, not just collect a check



If You Can Prove You're Technical and Pass Our Assessment, We'll Work With You — even if your resume doesn't check every box. Mindset and ability to learn with AI tools matters more than years of traditional experience.



What We Offer



$5–$10/hour USD to start — your pay grows as the platform grows

All AI tools provided — Claude Code, Claude Cowork, and everything you need

Exact processes and systems — we don't throw you in blind, you'll have clear playbooks to follow

Direct path to CTO — prove yourself over 6–12 months and step into an executive role

Partnership opportunity — the right person will eventually have a stake in the business

Real product, real customers — this isn't a side project. Subscribers are ready. We're launching.





The Interview Process



Reply to this ad — Send an
 to 
 with the subject line "SpeakerAgent.AI"

You'll receive an automatic reply with next steps, including:



A link to book your first interview with Justin

A short assessment to complete before your first interview





Interview 1 — We'll talk through your experience, walk through your assessment, and see if there's a fit

Interview 2 — A deeper dive into the product and how you'd work with us day-to-day (unless we're so impressed in round 1 that we move faster)



The assessment matters. It's not long — but it tells us whether you follow instructions, pay attention to detail, and actually engage with the process. Those qualities matter more than a stacked resume.



Ready to Build Something Real?

If you're technical, motivated, and excited about the idea of launching a SaaS from the ground floor with a real team and real customers — send us that
.

: 

Subject Line: SpeakerAgent.AI

We're not looking for perfect. We're looking for hungry. Let's build.

title: Legal Assistant
description:
We are a growing California, USA law firm focused on personal injury and landlord tenant cases. We are looking for a professional, reliable, and fluently English speaking assistant. Below are the primary responsibilities: 



 • Answer and make calls

 • Respond to text messages and
s

 • Gather case information using structured intake forms

 • Follow up with leads

 • Make outbound calls to clients and third parties

 • Assist with light legal administrative work

 • Organize documents and update our CRM system

 • Schedule consultations



This is a long-term position for someone who is detail-oriented, professional, and comfortable speaking on the phone. 



Hours will be Monday - Friday, 9:00am-6pm Pacific Time.

title: Performance Marketing & Technical Execution Assistant
description:
About The Role



We are building a growth ecosystem that combines marketing intelligence, operational systems and scalable digital infrastructure for small businesses.



This is not a basic VA role.



You will work directly with the founder to execute, optimise and strengthen digital marketing systems across both client accounts and internal brand projects. Initially you will implement strategy, but over time you will be expected to refine systems, identify improvements and think independently.



This role suits someone who enjoys ownership, metrics and continuous improvement.



Core Responsibilities



Execution

• Set up and optimise Meta ad campaigns

• Implement and troubleshoot tracking including GA4 and Meta Pixel

• Build and test funnels

• Implement SEO improvements

• Manage CRM and
 campaign execution

• Upload, format and optimise website content

• Maintain clean backend systems across platforms



Optimisation

• Review performance data and suggest improvements

• Identify inefficiencies in marketing workflows

• Improve SOPs and automation processes

• Proactively recommend performance enhancements



Operations

• Maintain task boards and accountability

• Document systems clearly

• Support automation builds and AI integrations



Platform Experience Required



You must be confident working inside the following platforms:

• Squarespace

• Shopify

• Go High Level

• Meta Ads Manager

• GA4 + Google Tags



**You should not require hand holding to navigate these platforms.**



Bonus if you also have experience with:

• ManyChat

• Klaviyo

• Looker Studio

• Zapier, Make or N8N

• Dripify



What Success Looks Like



Within 90 days you:

• Independently manage campaign builds and edits

• Maintain accurate tracking across accounts

• Improve at least one workflow or system

• Identify optimisation opportunities without prompting

• Operate with minimal oversight



Who This Role Is For



You are:

• Experienced in digital marketing execution

• Confident with technical backend platforms

• Structured and organised

• Calm under pressure

• Proactive rather than reactive

• Comfortable suggesting improvements

• Curious about automation and AI



We value self awareness and alignment in how we work.



If you know your Human Design, please include your Type and Authority in your application. (This is not a d
 factor, but it helps us understand how you operate best within a fast moving growth environment.)



In your application, please answer this:



1. Explain how you would set up a generate_lead event in GA4 using GTM.

2. What causes discrepancies between Meta and GA4 conversions?

3. Describe one technical SEO issue you have personally fixed.

title: German Bilingual Support (WFH)
description:
We're looking for a qualified Help Desk Support (German Speaker). The ideal candidate should have excellent German oral and written communication skills. The Help Desk Support will be part of our team where they will be helping banks to assist their merchants. Assistance is needed for PCI certification of the merchants that help them against fraudulent attacks and other similar cases. Well-defined procedure is available for completion of work with the goal of delivering quality service both to banks and their merchants. We look for individuals who enjoy a challenge and mental exercise. This position is permanent work from home.



 Responsibilities:



-Respond to customer queries proficiently and professionally in consideration of quality expectations

-Attentively listen to each call and thoroughly read
s to probe what kind of assistance the customer requires

-Navigate through different applications and prepare information that is essential to remain on track during support

-Collaborate with the team and contribute to discussions on challenging queries

-Accurately update database and logs for seamless consolidation of the changes that ensue

-Understand that data are sensitive and unwarranted disclosure is avoided



Qualifications:



-Must be fluent in speaking and writing in the Spanish Language

-A BPO German Customer Support experience is a plus

-Basic computer knowledge and can work with office applications and navigating the Internet

-Interpersonal skills that aid in problem-solving and knowledge-sharing

-Calmness and collectedness under pressure

-Accuracy and attention to detail

-Apt learning and understanding of foreign concepts

-Commitment to quality service based on customer's needs

-Has the ability to empathize with customer concerns

-Good at providing instructions

-Amenable to midshift/graveyard shift.

-Workplace should be conducive, free from background noise

title: E-commerce Graphic Designer
description:
DO NOT APPLY UNLESS YOU HAVE DIRECT EXPERIENCE CREATING ADS FOR E-COMMERCE BRANDS





We’re hiring a creative and innovative Graphic Designer to join our team, dedicated to crafting high-level ads for
, Instagram, and TikTok platforms.



As a Graphic Designer specializing in marketing and advertising, you will be instrumental in creating dynamic visual content designed to convert potential customers into sales for the brands we represent. 



You will be working both independently and as part of our team, this role requires flexibility, attention to detail, strategic thinking, and a profound knowledge of e-commerce, social media platforms, marketing strategies, and consumer psychology.





Role Responsibilities: 





Design with Purpose: Craft compelling design layouts that are not only visually appealing but are structured to guide the viewer's journey toward taking action. Your designs will serve as the backbone of our paid advertising campaigns across various platforms.



Call-to-action mastery: Strategically incorporate effective call-to-action (CTA) elements within your designs to prompt immediate responses from the target audience. Understanding the psychology behind CTAs and their placement is crucial.



Brand Guidelines Adherence: Follow brand guidelines meticulously to ensure consistency and brand integrity across all advertising materials. You will translate brand identities into visual designs that speak directly to the target audience.



Marketing Principles Knowledge: Apply fundamental marketing principles to your designs, understanding how visual elements can influence decision-making and enhance the effectiveness of ad campaigns aimed at converting viewers.



Collaboration and Strategy: Work closely with the marketing team to align design strategies with campaign goals, ensuring that all visual content is optimized for conversion and reflects the campaign's overall message.





Creative Design and Execution: Generate and edit high-level ads.





Brand and Audience Understanding: Deeply understand our partners' brands and target demographics to maintain brand consistency and voice across all designs.





Performance and Strategy: Drive key performance metrics by staying updated with the latest trends and best practices in social media design.





Collaboration and Improvement: Work closely with our team to continuously identify new creative opportunities and improve design processes for efficiency and effectiveness.





Qualifications & Things We’ll Love About You 





HOLISTIC UNDERSTANDING OF GRAPHIC DESIGN & OTHER AREAS OF EDITING





DIRECT EXPERIENCE 

Adobe Premiere Pro

Adobe After Effects

Photoshop

Adobe Illustrator

Final Cut Pro X

Canva

Figma

3+ Year of experience in content editing

Experience working remotely

Proven Track Record of success (relevant portfolio)



THINKS AND ACTS STRATEGICALLY 



COMMUNICATION

Excellent English written & verbal communication skills. 

Ability to relay complex strategy with EXTREME clarity.

Communicates proactively, and always closes the loop with leadership. 



COACHABLE COACH

Coachable and open-minded, with a strong desire to grow personally and professionally.



COLLABORATIVE & ADAPTIVE 

Able to collaborate across the organization. This includes team & external partners. 

Experience successfully working with high-level executives (i.e our partners) 

Ability to simultaneously balance stressful situations, short deadlines and multiple projects, tasks and tea
mbers reporting to you.

title: Executive Marketing and Advertising Director
description:
Executive Marketing & Advertising Director (Philippines – Remote)

About Cspot Global LLC

Cspot Global LLC is The Happy Space for Creators—a digital-first entertainment brand supporting creators across music and film through management, marketing, distribution, and strategic guidance. We’re building a global presence and looking for a senior marketing leader based in the Philippines to drive growth, brand visibility, and campaign performance.

Role Summary

The Executive Marketing & Advertising Director will own our marketing and advertising strategy end-to-end—planning, launching, and optimizing campaigns that grow our creator ecosystem, audience reach, and revenue. You’ll lead brand, performance marketing, and advertising execution across social, digital, and media channels, working closely with leadership and creative collaborators.

This is a senior, hands-on role for someone who can think strategically and execute.

Key Responsibilities

Strategy & Leadership

Build and lead the marketing and advertising strategy aligned with company growth goals

Translate business priorities into quarterly campaign roadmaps, budgets, and KPIs

Establish brand positioning and messaging consistency across all channels

Advertising & Performance Marketing

Plan, launch, and optimize paid campaigns (Meta, Google/YouTube, TikTok, etc. as applicable)

Own funnel performance: awareness ? engagement ? lead/customer conversion

Manage targeting, retargeting, creative testing, and budget pacing

Track ROAS/CAC and continuously improve performance through experimentation

Brand, Content & Creative Direction

Direct creative strategy for ads, social content, and promotional campaigns

Collaborate with designers, editors, creators, and external vendors to produce high-performing assets

Ensure campaigns reflect our brand voice: inclusive, creator-first, community-focused

Analytics & Reporting

Build reporting dashboards and weekly/monthly performance summaries

Use insights to guide decisions on spend, creative, channels, and audience strategy

Present clear recommendations to leadership based on data

Partnerships & Media (as needed)

Identify and manage media opportunities, influencer/creator partnerships, and promotional collaborations

Support PR and mainstrea
dia placements where relevant

Required Qualifications

5+ years in marketing/advertising with at least 2 years in a leadership role (Director/Head/Lead)

Proven experience managing paid advertising budgets and performance optimization

Strong understanding of digital marketing funnels, targeting, and conversion strategy

Excellent communication skills and ability to work directly with executives

Comfortable working Philippines-based while collaborating with a US-based leadership team (some schedule overlap required)

Preferred Qualifications (Nice to Have)

Experience in entertainment, music, film, creator economy, or talent-driven brands

Experience building marketing systems from scratch (processes, templates, reporting)

Copywriting and creative direction experience for ad performance

Familiarity with community-building and social impact storytelling

Tools & Skills (Examples)

Meta Ads Manager, Google Ads/YouTube Ads, TikTok Ads (as applicable)

Analytics: GA4, platform analytics, dashboards (Looker Studio, etc.)

Project management: Notion/Trello/Asana (any is fine)

Creative workflow collaboration with editors/designers

Success Metrics (First 90–180 Days)

Launch a clear marketing roadmap with measurable KPIs

Improve paid campaign efficiency (lower CAC, higher ROAS, stronger lead volume)

Increase brand reach and engagement across priority channels

Establish a repeatable campaign process (briefs, creative testing, reporting cadence)

Location & Work Setup

Location: Philippines (Remote)

Work Type: Full-time (preferred) or strong part-time with clear availability

Schedule: Some overlap with Pacific Time (Los Angeles) required

Compensation

Compensation will be based on experience and scope (salary or monthly retainer). Please include your expected monthly rate in PHP or USD.

How to Apply

Send:

Resume/CV or LinkedIn profile

A short note with 2–3 examples of campaigns you led (results preferred)

Your expected compensation and availability

If you tell me (1) full-time vs part-time, (2) whether this person will manage a team, and (3) your target monthly budget range, I’ll tailor this into a tighter version that’s ready to post on OnlineJobs.ph, LinkedIn, and
 groups (with the right tone + screening questions).











Keep all of this and make them responsible for making this a global brand







Executive Marketing & Advertising Director (Philippines – Remote)

About Cspot Global LLC

Cspot Global LLC is The Happy Space for Creators—a digital-first entertainment brand supporting creators across music and film through management, marketing, distribution, and strategic guidance. We’re building a global presence and looking for a senior marketing leader based in the Philippines to drive growth, brand visibility, and campaign performance.

Role Summary

The Executive Marketing & Advertising Director will own our marketing and advertising strategy end-to-end—planning, launching, and optimizing campaigns that grow our creator ecosystem, audience reach, and revenue. You’ll lead brand, performance marketing, and advertising execution across social, digital, and media channels, working closely with leadership and creative collaborators.

This role is also accountable for building Cspot Global into a recognizable global brand—creating the strategy, systems, and campaigns that expand our international reach, strengthen brand authority, and position us as a creator-first leader worldwide.

This is a senior, hands-on role for someone who can think strategically and execute.

Key Responsibilities

Global Brand Growth & Market Expansion (Core Ownership)

Build and execute a global brand strategy to position Cspot Global as The Happy Space for Creators worldwide

Identify priority international markets and develop go-to-market plans by region (audience, channels, messaging, partnerships)

Ensure brand consistency across countries while adapting messaging to cultural and market differences

Develop global brand guidelines (voice, visuals, messaging pillars) and enforce them across campaigns and partners

Build a scalable marketing engine that supports international artist launches, film projects, and creator services

Strategy & Leadership

Build and lead the marketing and advertising strategy aligned with company growth goals

Translate business priorities into quarterly campaign roadmaps, budgets, and KPIs

Establish brand positioning and messaging consistency across all channels

Advertising & Performance Marketing

Plan, launch, and optimize paid campaigns (Meta, Google/YouTube, TikTok, etc. as applicable)

Own funnel performance: awareness ? engagement ? lead/customer conversion

Manage targeting, retargeting, creative testing, and budget pacing

Track ROAS/CAC and continuously improve performance through experimentation

Brand, Content & Creative Direction

Direct creative strategy for ads, social content, and promotional campaigns

Collaborate with designers, editors, creators, and external vendors to produce high-performing assets

Ensure campaigns reflect our brand voice: inclusive, creator-first, community-focused

Analytics & Reporting

Build reporting dashboards and weekly/monthly performance summaries

Use insights to guide decisions on spend, creative, channels, and audience strategy

Present clear recommendations to leadership based on data

Partnerships & Media (as needed)

Identify and manage media opportunities, influencer/creator partnerships, and promotional collaborations

Support PR and mainstrea
dia placements where relevant

Build relationships with international communities, platforms, and partners that accelerate global visibility

Required Qualifications

5+ years in marketing/advertising with at least 2 years in a leadership role (Director/Head/Lead)

Proven experience managing paid advertising budgets and performance optimization

Strong understanding of digital marketing funnels, targeting, and conversion strategy

Experience building brand presence beyond one local market (multi-region or international exposure)

Excellent communication skills and ability to work directly with executives

Comfortable working Philippines-based while collaborating with a US-based leadership team (some schedule overlap required)

Preferred Qualifications (Nice to Have)

Experience in entertainment, music, film, creator economy, or talent-driven brands

Experience building marketing systems from scratch (processes, templates, reporting)

Copywriting and creative direction experience for ad performance

Familiarity with community-building and social impact storytelling

Experience launching campaigns across multiple countries/regions

Tools & Skills (Examples)

Meta Ads Manager, Google Ads/YouTube Ads, TikTok Ads (as applicable)

Analytics: GA4, platform analytics, dashboards (Looker Studio, etc.)

Project management: Notion/Trello/Asana (any is fine)

Creative workflow collaboration with editors/designers

Success Metrics (First 90–180 Days)

Launch a clear marketing roadmap with measurable KPIs

Publish global brand guidelines + messaging pillars

Identify 2–4 priority international markets and launch initial campaigns in each

Improve paid campaign efficiency (lower CAC, higher ROAS, stronger lead volume)

Increase brand reach and engagement across priority channels

Establish a repeatable campaign process (briefs, creative testing, reporting cadence)

Secure early-stage global partnerships (media, creators, platforms, communities)

Location & Work Setup

Location: Philippines (Remote)

Work Type: Full-time (preferred) or strong part-time with clear availability

Schedule: Some overlap with Pacific Time (Los Angeles) required

Compensation

Compensation will be based on experience and scope (salary or monthly retainer). Please include your expected monthly rate in PHP or USD.

How to Apply

Send:

Resume to 

A short note with 2–3 examples of campaigns you led (results preferred), including any international/global work

Your expected compensation and availability



Beginner level (Ave Low): Monthly: approximately $465.00 - $565.00 per month (?26,500 - ?32,300 per month) | Hourly: approximately $3.00 per hour (?171 per hour)



Intermediate level (Mean): Monthly: approximately $620.00 - $760.00 per month (?35,400 - ?43,200 per month) | Hourly: approximately $4.01 per hour (?228 per hour)



Experienced level (Ave High): Monthly: approximately $880.00 - $1,075.00 per month (?50,000 - ?61,200 per month) | Hourly: approximately $5.67 per hour (?323 per hour)

title: Drafter (Interior Design) - Remote
description:
Job Summary



We are seeking a detail-oriented and creative Drafter to support our interior design projects from concept development through construction documentation. The ideal candidate will translate design ideas into accurate technical drawings while collaborating closely with designers, project managers, and contractors to ensure smooth project execution.



Key Responsibilities



-Prepare accurate 2D and 3D drawings using AutoCAD and other relevant drafting software.

-Translate design concepts into detailed technical drawings and construction documentation.

-Produce layout plans, elevations, sections, shop drawings, and as-built drawings.

-Coordinate with designers, consultants, suppliers, and contractors to ensure drawing accuracy and feasibility.

-Conduct site measurements and assist in resolving technical issues during project execution.

-Maintain organized documentation and manage drawing revisions efficiently.

-Ensure all drawings comply with relevant regulations, standards, and project requirements.



Qualifications & Requirements



-Degree in Interior Design, Architecture, Drafting, or related field.

-Minimum 2-3 years of relevant drafting experience (interior design preferred).

-Proficient in AutoCAD; knowledge of SketchUp, Revit, or other 3D software is an advantage.

-Strong understanding of construction detailing, materials, and drafting standards.

-A strong sense of responsibility and aesthetic sensibility.

-Excellent communication skills and confidence in presentations.

-Self-discipline and the ability to work independently.

-Detail-oriented, organized, and able to manage multiple projects within deadlines.



Please submit your resume together with a portfolio showcasing your drafting works. Applications without a portfolio may not be considered.

title: Property Operations Coordinator
description:
Remote Property Operations Coordinator (AU Short-Term Rentals)

Philippines-based | Full-time | AEST-aligned



Join One of Australia’s Largest Short-Term Rental Businesses



This is a rare long-term opportunity to work directly with one of Australia’s most established short-term rental operators — supporting a growing portfolio of up to 800 properties across NSW.



Staff Connect Australia is building a high-performing offshore team, and we’re looking for a proactive, detail-driven Property Operations Coordinator to become one of our foundational hires. If you’re sharp, confident on calls, and love problem-solving in a fast-paced environment, this role has serious growth potential.



You’ll be right at the heart of daily operations — handling bookings, guest and owner communications, issue resolution, and admin support — with exposure to every part of Australian short-term rental management.



What You’ll Be Doing



This is a hands-on, dynamic role. Your responsibilities will include:

- Guest & Owner Support

- Handle inbound and outbound calls with guests and property owners via Aircall

- Respond to enquiries and issues via Airbnb, 
, direct bookings

- Resolve problems efficiently and follow through to completion





Operations & Coordination

- Monitor bookings, availability, and calendars using Homhero, RMS, and other systems

- Coordinate cleaning schedules and ensure properties are guest-ready

- Assign and follow up maintenance tasks with trades or contractors

- Track cleans, maintenance, guest issues, and owner communications



Admin, Reporting & Growth

- Manage booking calendars, pricing, and blackout dates

- Assist with onboarding new properties and system setup

- Support compliance documentation (smoke alarms, council registration, etc.)

- Prepare weekly/monthly reports using spreadsheets or dashboards

- Help draft and improve SOPs, internal docs, and guest manuals

- Identify workflow gaps and suggest smarter processes or automations



As the business grows, your role will grow with it — including pricing, owner reporting, SOP ownership, and broader operational oversight.



Who We’re Looking For



You’re someone who:

- Is confident on the phone and professional with both guests and property owners

- Thrives in fast-paced, customer-facing environments

- Is organised, proactive, and solutions-focused

- Can juggle multiple tools and tasks without being micromanaged

- Takes ownership and actually cares about doing things properly



Skills & Experience



Required:

- Excellent spoken & written English

- Stable internet connection

- Confident handling phone calls

- Experience (or fast learning ability) with Aircall, Homhero

- Familiarity with Airbnb, 
, and direct booking sites

- Strong organisational & multitasking skills

- Proficient in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, Outlook)



Preferred (but not mandatory)



- 2+ years in short-term rentals, property management, or admin support

- Experience working with Australian clients

- Exposure to cleaning teams or remote contractors



We’re open to candidates with less experience if you show initiative, strong communication skills, and the right mindset.



Tools You’ll Use

Core Systems:

- Homhero, RMS, Breezeway, Orana

- Comms & Support:

- Aircall, Slack, Zoom, MS Teams, Google Meet, WhatsApp

- Automation & Docs:

- ChatGPT, Zapier, Google Docs, Canva, Microsoft Office, WordPress



Bonus Tools:

- PriceLabs or other pricing platforms





What You’ll Get:



- Full-time role – 40 hrs/week (AEST-aligned)

- Structured roster – 7-day operation with rotating shifts

- You’ll work one or both weekend days

- Always two consecutive days off each week

- Paid training & onboarding

- Direct mentorship from leadership

- Long-term career growth in a scaling business

- Exposure to end-to-end Australian STR operations



A role where initiative, ownership, and ideas are genuinely valued

title: Technical SEO specialist (Directory Platform)
description:
Technical SEO Specialist (Headless Marketplace Platform)



We are looking for an experienced and proactive Technical SEO Specialist to help optimize, structure, and scale our headless marketplace platform.

Our platform operates as an online directory connecting clients with independent service providers. As a headless web application, our SEO requires careful technical implementation, particularly around rendering, crawlability, and indexation.



We are currently focused on accelerating organic growth and improving search visibility, especially in areas such as:

-Google Images indexing and visibility

-Technical SEO architecture

-Sitemap optimization (including image sitemaps)

-Meta title and description optimization at scale

-Structured data implementation

-Crawlability and indexation improvements

-Internal linking strategy

-UX elements impacting SEO performance



We recently identified that certain technical decisions (including image access restrictions) negatively impacted our Google Images visibility. We are now restructuring our SEO foundation and are looking for someone who understands marketplace SEO at a platform level not just page-level optimisation.



What We’re Looking For



We need someone who:

-Has strong experience in technical SEO

-Understands headless architecture and SEO implications (SSR, rendering, metadata handling)

-Knows how Google crawls and indexes dynamic content and images

-Has experience with large directory or listing-based websites

-Can communicate clearly and effectively with developers

-Is proactive and identifies opportunities (not just executes tasks)

-Thinks in terms of long-term scalability and growth



This is not a basic SEO role. We are looking for someone who understands platform-level SEO strategy, scalability, and structured growth execution.



Your Responsibilities:

-Conduct a full technical SEO audit

-Identify and resolve indexation and crawlability issues

-Improve Google Images visibility and image structure

-Optimize sitemap structure (including image sitemaps)

-Improve site-wide meta structure at scale

-Refine internal linking architecture

-Identify organic growth opportunities

-Provide clear, developer-ready action plans

-Monitor Search Console, crawl data, and performance metrics



We are looking for someone reliable, detail-oriented, analytical, and growth-focused.

title: Kajabi Expert Needed ASAP: Build Online Course, Sales Funnel & Email Automations
description:
Job Description:

I am looking for a highly experienced Kajabi specialist to help me launch my online video course and assist in updating my website as well.



I need this entire course ecosystem built, organized, and live as soon as possible so I can begin marketing and promoting this part of my business. I already have the platform (Kajabi) and the content; I need an expert to piece it all together seamlessly.



What You Will Do:



Course Setup: Upload, format, and logically organize all video content and modules into the Kajabi course product.



Offer Creation: Set up the pricing, checkout pages, and course offers.



Landing Page & Funnel Building: Design and build a high-converting landing/sales page and set up the necessary sales funnel to capture leads and drive course purchases.



 & Automations: Build out and connect automated
 sequences, set up tagging rules, and create nurture campaigns to engage leads and onboard new students.



Tech Integration: Ensure all backend settings, payment gateways, and system automations within Kajabi are connected and functioning flawlessly.



Testing: QA the entire process to ensure a smooth user experience from the first landing page click to the final course access.



Requirements:



Proven, hands-on experience building courses, funnels, and
 automations specifically in Kajabi. (Do not apply if you have not built in Kajabi before).



A strong eye for clean, professional design on landing pages.



Understanding of sales funnel strategy,
 marketing flow, and user experience.



Excellent English communication skills and attention to detail.



How to Apply:

To ensure you have read this entire post, please include the phrase "Kajabi Launch 2026" at the very top of your application or cover letter.



Please also include:



Links to 2-3 landing pages or funnels you have built in Kajabi.



A brief explanation of your process for taking a course from raw videos to a live offer (including your approach to setting up the
 automations).



Your estimated timeline for completing a project like this.

title: WordPress Redesign Project
description:
We are a U.S.-based company seeking a talented and detail-oriented website specialist to redesign and modernize our current WordPress website. The goal is a polished, professional online presence that reflects our brand identity and provides a seamless user experience. It should also work across multiple platforms (desktop, mobile, etc.).



You will lead the design and development process, propose an updated layout and structure, and deliver a fast, scalable WordPress setup that is easy for our staff to maintain.



Key Responsibilities:



- Review our existing website and identify opportunities to improve design, structure, and performance.

- Propose updated layouts and design concepts aligned with the firm's branding.

- Design and build a fully custom WordPress theme (not a modified marketplace theme or template).

- Implement a streamlined page-building workflow using native WordPress tools or a lightweight editor.

- Collaborate with our SEO coordinator and designer to ensure best practices in structure, navigation, and optimization.

- Provide basic documentation or training so tea
mbers can make edits confidently after launch.



Qualifications:



- Demonstrated experience building custom WordPress themes from scratch (please include portfolio links).

- Strong knowledge of WordPress architecture, performance optimization, and SEO-friendly structures.

- Excellent grasp of responsive design and intuitive UX principles.

- Ability to design within an established brand while refreshing the look and feel.

- Clear communication skills and comfort working with a remote, U.S.-based team.

- Experience working with law firms or professional services clients is a plus.



Project Details:



- One-time redesign project with potential for ongoing work.

- Flexible working hours, though some overlap with U.S. Eastern Time is preferred.



To Apply:



Please include the following with your application:



- Links to 2–3 WordPress sites you have designed or redesigned, preferably custom theme work.

- A summary of your relevant experience.

- Your resume or CV.

- Your preferred hourly rate (or flat rate) and estimated project timeline.

- A brief note on which WordPress tools or workflows you prefer.



Please use at least 5 apply points and include the word maple in the subject line of your application.

description:

We pride ourselves on providing thoughtful, tailored counsel and maintaining long-term relationships built on trust and reliability.

mbers to ensure smooth project coordination.

We believe in rewarding effort, developing talent, and promoting from within.

) addressing the following:

title: Senior Automation & Systems Specialist [GoHighLevel]
description:
Underpaid, Under-Appreciated, And Unfulfilled?

Your GHL Automations & Operations Skills Deserve More Than “Just Another Job”



You’re Not “Just a VA”

And deep down… you’ve known that for too long



There’s something different about how your mind works.



You don’t just follow instructions and complete tasks



You see how everything connects - Like Neil from the Matrix.

You notice inefficiencies others overlook.

You question why systems are structured the way they are.

You think in patterns. In logic. In architecture.



When something breaks, you don’t patch it...



You trace it.

You diagnose it.

You fix it properly.



And while you’re grateful for your current role…

You know it doesn’t fully use your capability.



It’s not about complaining.

It’s not about being ungrateful.



You’re loyal. You always have been.

But that quiet restlessness?



That feeling that you could be building something more meaningful?



That’s a sign that you’re put here for more, much more.



And ignoring that feeling doesn’t make it disappear.



THE MISSION BEHIND THE WORK 



We are Australia’s #1 Divorce Prevention & Relationship Recovery Organisation



Specialising in working with men whose marriages are close to breaking down and their families falling apart.



When our systems work properly:



• Families stay together longer

• Children grow up in happier & healthier homes

• Generational damage is prevented

• Lives are genuinely changed

• Communities are stronger



This is not random 'agency work'.

Or working in another ‘coaching business’

Nor is this just marketing automation...



This is infrastructure supporting families in crisis.



Some call it ‘God’s Work’.



We see it as our Mission and Duty



And strong backend systems make it possible!



YOUR WORKING ENVIRONMENT



#1, We respect and understand Filipino culture.



Family matters.

Stability matters.

Loyalty matters.

Being proud of your work matters.



We are building a long-term, structured team environment where:



•Your thinking is valued

• Your improvements are implemented

• Communication is calm and clear

• Expectations are structured

• Growth is real

• Performance increases are real



The Australian Time Zone AEST and working hours are perfectly aligned to support happier and healthier Filipino families.



This is not chaos

This is not micromanagement.

This is stable, consistent, mission-driven work with high standards.



THE ROLE - EXPERIENCED AUTOMATION AND SYSTEMS SPECIALIST 



We are not looking for “a VA.”



We are looking for an Experienced Systems & Automation Specialist.



You will:



• Build and optimise advanced workflows

• Diagnose automation failures and trace root causes

• Design clean tagging and segmentation architecture

• Prevent duplicate triggers and workflow collisions

• Improve CRM clarity and structure

• Integrate Stripe, Zapier, Pabbly, Webhooks and APIs

• QA test before deployment

• Document systems clearly

• Proactively suggest structural improvements



If you enjoy clean systems, logical architecture, this role will challenge and expand you.



WHAT MATTERS MOST FOR US - NON NEGOTIABLE



Critical thinking!



When something breaks, you must be able to:



1. Identify what happened

2. Find the root cause

3. Fix it properly

4. Prevent it from happening again



Silence when stuck is not acceptable.

Communication and ownership are essential.

You will always be met with respect, understanding, and listened to.

There are no mistakes - Only Learnings



WHAT SUCCESS WILL LOOK LIKE FOR YOU



If selected, you will begin with a 30-day paid trial period.



During this time, you will:



• Audit and map our automation systems

• Work closely with our experienced Operations & Systems Engineer

• Learn our workflow architecture

• Identify improvement opportunities



You will be supported.

But you will also be evaluated.



At the end of 30 days, if performance meets expectations, you will be offered:



• A permanent full-time contract

• Stable long-term work

• Ongoing performance-based growth

• Expanded responsibility as your capability grows



IMPORTANT: This is not freelance work!



We have and are expanding our long-term high-performance team.

You will be positioned with A Players - The best of the best, and be paid accordingly.



WE ONLY OPERATE WITH HIGH STANDARDS AND STRONG VALUES



This role requires real experience and knowledge



You must be comfortable:



• Diagnosing complex workflow failures

• Understanding automation sequencing logic

• Identifying trigger conflicts

• Designing scalable systems

• Explaining your thinking clearly



If your experience is surface-level, it will become clear VERY quickly.



The work we do impacts families in crisis



Leads cannot fall through cracks.

Systems cannot break silently.



There is too much at stake for 'guesswork' or 'winging it'.



APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS [Important]



At the top of your application, write: ARCHITECT777



Applications without this word will not be reviewed.



In your application, include:



1. A short explanation of a complex workflow you built



2. A screenshot of a workflow with conditional logic



3. A description of a system issue you diagnosed and permanently solved



4. Your expected monthly salary (USD) based on full-time commitment

[We compensate based on capability, performance and long-term alignment]



FINAL NOTE: 



If you’re simply looking for another job, someone easy to do…

This probably isn’t it.



But if you’re looking for:



• Meaning

• Stability

• Growth

• Respect

• A mission to give you purpose 



Then we’d love to hear from you

Founder - Leonidas Sheed

title: Full-Time Graphic Designer (40 hrs/week)
description:
ABOUT US:

We are a well-established e-commerce company with over 10 years of success in the baby products niche, specializing in party supplies. Our brand is powered by a growing team of high-achievers who value ownership, honesty, and continuous improvement. Many of our tea
mbers have been with us for years and grown into bigger roles. For instance, our manager started as a Virtual Assistant through OnlineJobs.ph nearly 5 years ago and has grown into her leadership role. We are committed to helping you succeed and invest in people who want to grow long-term, not just find “another online job.”



ABOUT THE ROLE:

We are looking for a reliable, detail-oriented, and creative full-time Graphic Designer who takes pride in high-quality work. You will work on product images, simple videos, AI-generated visuals, social media creatives, packaging, and light product design. You don’t need to know every tool yet, what matters most is that you are visually creative, eager to learn, and excited to improve every week. You are comfortable working with autonomy, responding to feedback, and you see this role as a chance to grow your skills and build a long-term career with PRIMEPURE.



This role offers semi-flexible hours with weekly calls across time zones and day-to-day work done independently.



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Edit and enhance product images for our listings and website (cleanups, simple retouching, basic composites).

- Create lifestyle images and simple mockups to showcase our products.

- Design social media creatives aligned with our brand.

- Assist with product packaging layouts and small product design elements.

- Create simple marketing assets such as banners,
 graphics, and promotional visuals.

- Use AI tools as part of your creative process (for example, to generate ideas, mockups, or variations) and refine outputs for real-world use.

- Organize design files and follow our brand guidelines and templates.

- Communicate clearly with the team in writing and on calls, sharing progress and asking smart questions when truly needed.



REQUIREMENTS:

- Strong visual sense and creativity: You care about aesthetics, composition, and clear visual communication.

- Basic experience with at least one design tool (e.g., Canva, Photoshop, Illustrator, or similar).

- Willingness and excitement to learn Photoshop and Illustrator with our guidance.

- Highly organized: Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple design tasks.

- Self-motivated and autonomous: You set mini-deadlines, move work forward without reminders, and keep your commitments.

- Research-first mindset: You look for tutorials, inspiration, and examples before asking the team.

- Eager to learn: You actively look for feedback, new tools, and better ways to work.



DESIRED SKILLS (preferred but not required):

- Familiarity with e-commerce or product-based brands (Amazon, Shopify, etc.).

- Experience with short-form video editing (reels, TikToks, simple product videos).

- Experience creating packaging, labels, or print-ready files.

- Experience using tools like Asana, Slack, or similar project-management/communication platforms.



BENEFITS:

- 100% remote work.

- Competitive salary with opportunities for performance-based increases up to twice per year.

- Internet bill coverage.

- Long-term growth opportunities in a stable, fast-moving company.

- Access to training resources and a supportive leadership team that wants you to succeed.



NOTE ABOUT USE OF AI:

We actively use and encourage AI tools in our day-to-day work, and we see them as a powerful way to work smarter. However, during the hiring process we ask that you complete all application questions and exercises yourself, without AI assistance. We genuinely want to get to know the real YOU, not a "perfectly polished, robotic answer" you. Don’t worry about sentence structure or grammar; what matters to us is the substance of your answers and the honesty behind them. If we believe AI has been used to generate your responses, your application will not be considered.



HOW TO APPLY (READ CAREFULLY):

- Use this
 subject line exactly: "I will not use AI"

- At the very top of your
 body, before anything else, write this sentence exactly: "Hello PRIMEPURE team, I pay attention to small details"

- In the rest of the
 body, in a few short sentences, answer these two questions:



1. What would you want us to remember about you after reading 100 applications? Feel free to attach your portfolio here.

2. What are your salary expectations for this position (per month in USD)?



Applications that do not follow these few simple instructions will sadly not be considered. If shortlisted, you’ll receive an
 from Anna with instructions on the next steps. Thank you for your time, and best of luck!

title: HR Generalist/Recruiter (Virtual Assistant Recruitment)
description:
Please provide a CV Resume with your submission. 



Working Hours: 10 AM - 6 PM CST



Company Overview:

MV Corporate is a growing and dynamic company dedicated to providing top-tier Virtual Assistant (VA) solutions for various divisions, including property management, real estate acquisitions, digital marketing, and administrative support. As we expand, we are seeking a highly motivated HR Generalist/Recruiter to join our team and take charge of sourcing, hiring, and onboarding Virtual Assistants to support our company’s growth. This role will also focus on developing strategies to retain top talent and ensure a high-performing VA team.





Position Overview:

The HR Generalist/Recruiter will be responsible for managing the end-to-end recruitment process for Virtual Assistants while also focusing on talent retention and department structuring. This individual will be responsible for creating SOPs for the HR department, improving HR processes, and implementing new strategies to keep and develop top talent. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of the VA talent market, experience in full-cycle recruiting, and the ability to identify candidates who align with our company culture and goals.





Key Responsibilities:

Recruitment & Talent Acquisition:

Develop and execute recruitment strategies to source top-tier Virtual Assistants for various roles, including administrative support, marketing, real estate, and property management.

Post job listings on relevant job boards, social media platforms, and recruitment channels.

Screen resumes, conduct initial interviews, and shortlist qualified candidates for final review.

Manage the interview and hiring process, ensuring smooth communication between candidates and hiring managers.

Conduct reference checks and background verifications as needed.

Maintain an up-to-date candidate pipeline to meet the company's ongoing VA hiring needs.

HR, Onboarding & SOP Development:

Create and implement Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for the HR department to streamline recruitment, onboarding, and HR processes.

Coordinate the onboarding process for newly hired Virtual Assistants, ensuring they have the necessary tools, training, and resources to succeed.

Develop and maintain onboarding materials, company policies, and training documentation.

Assist in creating HR policies and procedures for the VA workforce.

Maintain employee records and HR databases, ensuring compliance with company policies.





Talent Retention & Employee Engagement:

Develop and implement new talent retention strategies to ensure we keep top-performing Virtual Assistants.

Plan and execute virtual team-building activities, training, and employee recognition programs.

Monitor employee performance and job satisfaction through regular check-ins and feedback loops.

Address employee concerns and provide support to improve engagement and productivity.

Continuously research and introduce best practices in remote workforce retention to enhance the work environment.





Qualifications:

Minimum of 3 years experience in HR, recruitment, or talent acquisition, preferably in a remote or virtual setting.

Strong understanding of the Virtual Assistant job market, particularly in real estate, property management, and digital marketing.

Experience creating and implementing SOPs for HR operations.

Knowledge of talent retention strategies and employee engagement best practices.

Experience managing full-cycle recruitment, from sourcing to hiring.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to assess candidates effectively.

Ability to work independently in a remote environment with minimal supervision.

Proficiency in HR tools, applicant tracking systems (ATS), and virtual communication platforms.

Reliable high-speed internet connection.

Familiarity with US time zones and ability to work 10 AM - 6 PM CST.



Bonus Skills:

Experience in HR operations, onboarding, and employee engagement initiatives.

Knowledge of labor laws and best practices for remote work and virtual teams.

Familiarity with GoHighLevel (GHL) or Zoho CRM is a plus.



Benefits:

Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.

Flexible working environment.

Opportunity to work with a fast-growing company and develop your HR career.

Professional development and growth opportunities.

title: Mortgage Loan Processor

title: Bookkeeper & Accounting Specialist
description:
Before applying, please watch this video: 



We are a rapidly growing real estate asset management company seeking an experienced, detail-driven Virtual Bookkeeper to join our team. This role is ideal for someone who understands the complexities of real estate accounting, thrives in a structured and process-oriented environment, and can independently manage financial records with precision. If you enjoy supporting multiple properties or business units and take pride in maintaining clean, accurate books, we’d love to hear from you.



Key Responsibilities:

- Maintain and manage financial records within QuickBooks, ensuring accuracy, consistency, and compliance across all accounts

- Structure and refine account categories, subcategories, and classes—including building out custom classifications as needed

- Perform comprehensive bank and credit card reconciliations by comparing transactions across QuickBooks, bank statements, and vendor records

- Handle data entry for journal entries, payroll files, W9s, invoices, receipts, and all financial documentation

- Prepare, review, and analyze financial reports such as Profit & Loss statements, Balance Sheets, and property/entity-specific summaries

- Track, manage, and report income and expenses across multiple properties or real estate business units

- Ensure all accounts remain up to date, including investor distributions, mortgages, insurance, utilities, vendors, and credit card payments

- Manage inventory, assets, and property-related financial records



Qualifications:

- Proven experience as a Bookkeeper—preferably in real estate, asset management, or property management

- Strong proficiency in QuickBooks (required) and solid grounding in accounting principles

- Exceptional attention to detail, accuracy, and consistency when handling financial data

- Ability to work independently, manage deadlines, and stay organized with minimal supervision

- Strong communication skills (written and verbal) with a proactive, problem-solving mindset

- Familiarity with real estate accounting best practices, industry standards, and compliance requirements

- Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field (preferred but not required)

- Bookkeeping or accounting certifications (e.g., QuickBooks ProAdvisor) are a strong plus

title: Video & Podcast Editor – Long & Short-Form Content | URGENT HIRING
description:
Are you a creative storyteller with a passion for editing long-form YouTube videos and podcasts? Do you thrive on transforming raw content into polished, engaging pieces that keep audiences coming back for more?



We’re looking for a skilled Video & Podcast Editor to join our growing team at MV Corporate. You will play a central role in expanding our YouTube channel and launching a new podcast. While your primary focus will be on long-form content, you will also produce short-form highlights for TikTok, Instagram, and
 to extend our reach. This is an exciting opportunity to shape the future of our content strategy, work with creative freedom, and grow with a company that values innovation.



What You’ll Do:



In this role, you will edit long-form YouTube videos and podcast episodes that are polished, engaging, and aligned with our brand. You will enhance audio quality by balancing sound levels and removing background noise, and collaborate on episode flow, intros, outros, and visual overlays to keep viewers engaged. You will also repurpose long-form content into short-form clips for social media, use AI-powered tools to streamline workflow and elevate production quality, and design compelling thumbnails, banners, and visual assets that attract clicks and views. Additionally, you will manage scheduling and publishing through GoHighLevel (creative side only) and stay ahead of YouTube and podcast trends to ensure our content remains fresh and competitive.



What We’re Looking For:



The ideal candidate has strong proficiency in editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, and CapCut, along with experience in audio editing using Adobe Audition. Familiarity with AI-powered editing tools like Descript, Runway, and Otter.ai is essential. A deep understanding of YouTube algorithms, SEO, and strategies for audience retention is required, as is the ability to create thumbnails, overlays, and storytelling elements that captivate viewers. Experience using GoHighLevel for scheduling content and the ability to manage multiple projects independently while meeting deadlines will set you apart.



Bonus Skills:



Applicants with knowledge of YouTube SEO and analytics to optimize performance, experience distributing podcasts on platforms such as Spotify, Apple Podcasts, or Google Podcasts, and familiarity with social media growth strategies for cross-promotion will have an advantage.





TO APPLY:

Send us your updated CV/resume and also you must provide us with proven portfolio showcasing long-form YouTube videos and podcast editing, a strong creative vision with storytelling skills that keep audiences hooked, and excellent communication and collaboration abilities.



Why Join Us?



At MV Corporate, you will be part of an innovative and supportive team that values creativity and growth. This role offers the opportunity to shape impactful content, enjoy creative freedom, and contribute to a channel and podcast with high growth potential, all while working in a fully remote environment.

title: Credit Repair Disputer
description:
MUST SEND A 60 SECOND LOOM WITH YOUR EXPERIENCE TO BE CONSIDERED FOR POSITION!



Virtual Assistant for Credit Repair and Financial Literacy



Location: Remote



Are you passionate about helping others achieve financial freedom and literacy? We are seeking a skilled Virtual Assistant to join our team and assist clients in disputing inaccurate credit reports and navigating the complex world of credit repair and financial literacy.



YOU MUST RECORD A 2 MIN OR 60 SECOND VIDEO EXPLAINING YOUR KNOWLEDGE AND EXPERIENCE ALONG WITH PROVEN RESULTS OF YOUR WORK OR YOU WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED.



Responsibilities:

- File complaints with consumer protection agencies such as the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB), Better Business Bureau (BBB), and Attorney General's office when necessary.

- Utilize extensive knowledge of the credit repair process in America to provide expert guidance and support to clients.

- Communicate effectively with clients to address their concerns, answer inquiries, and provide updates on the dispute process.

- Demonstrate true determination and heart in advocating for clients' rights and financial well-being.



Qualifications:

- Extensive knowledge of the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA) and other relevant laws governing credit reporting and repair.

- Proven ability to file complaints with consumer protection agencies, such as the CFPB, BBB, and Attorney General's office.

- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to empathize and connect with clients.

- True determination and heart to help clients overcome financial challenges and achieve their goals.



Benefits:

- Flexible remote work environment.

- Opportunity to make a meaningful impact in the lives of others.

- Competitive compensation package.



If you have a passion for helping others and possess the skills and qualifications listed above, we want to hear from you! Apply now to join our team and make a difference in the world of credit repair and financial literacy.



3 Commas Solutions is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity in the workplace. We encourage applications from all qualified individuals regardless of race, ethnicity, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, or other protected status.

title: Executive Assistant/Client Manager
description:
Executive Assistant / Client Manager



Tech / Software Industry



We are seeking an experienced Executive Assistant / Client Manager with a background in the Tech/Software industry and prior experience working in a Marketing Agency environment.



This role combines high-level executive support with client relationship management. The ideal candidate is organized, proactive, and comfortable operating in fast-paced, performance-driven environments.

Provide executive-level administrative support to senior leadership

Manage complex calendars, reporting, and cross-functional coordination

Serve as primary point of contact for assigned client accounts

Oversee client onboarding and ensure timely delivery of projects

Qualifications

Experience in a Tech or Software company

Prior experience in a Marketing Agency (required)

Strong organizational and communication skills
